abayi however my roots are in pede emusha becoz that is where my parents are from
and that is the place that i call home um however my background in terms of studying and and growing up i grew up in the township of iinyu Britsen ebayi
i did all of my studying there from primary school high school as well as tertiary education
um so i'm born and bred in port Elizabeth but my roots are in pedi ndingumakoqolo andingangwanga

yayibhalisa amabali amnandi kakhulu abantu babihlala iminopsoku bephulaphile kuyo kora kwathi ngethuba iintaka amabali khula isekukeni iqalisa uphelwa ngamandla nangona lona elizwi lalihleli mnandi xa abantu bekalisa ukukhwanza kuyo besithi ndaka yamabali s balisele amabali yayisuka ke isekubo yambaka mnini kora ke iyakuqubeka isithi kubo
ssh sanokola ssondelani ssolani nipholapule emva kwethuba ke abantu babeqwalasela ukuba ngoku iintsibazayo asafani naqala ziyaphelelwa kwaye ke namhloayo amahle ayajiganoko abanye ke basabeza besithii inokubamhlambi iyagula ngoko iintaka yamabali
ngenye imini ke badibanabantu phantikomthi baqalisa ukwaza besithi ndaka yamabali sbalisele yamabali kodwa iintaka izange iivele bantolabam baphindaka bantu bakhwaza kwakhona bakhwazadaka yamabali sibalisele yamabali
kora ke intaka ayavela baqalisa ukhathazeka bantwana boyi yika abantu abakhulu ngoku wabuzake omnye umntu omdana ukuba
ingaba kwenzekantoni kuyo intaka yamabali ingabalikona ithembe lokubasa kuyiva ithetha kwakhona
babuza nakibawodwa apho abantu bantu ngaphezulu becinga ukuba hleze ize kubo iintaka emabali kodwa zangeyivele ngaloo mini
iintaka entle emabali yayiziva izikhalo zabantu isazi ukuba bakhatizekile ngayo
kodwa yayisele ilithuba lokuba babuyele emakhaya kanika nuke zindabeni yaafika apho intaka
yaphumla kwiigophe lithile yazimla kwindawayo ekhethekileyo yaziwayi yordwa apho eliweni intaka yamabali
yaqalisa ke intaka ngokuzoleyo kubalisa ibali iintsukungeintsuku ilizilayo lithamba ngokuthamba
laza ilizilayo laphindaphinda ngapha kwendaba la zalisa amawa ibalingalinye kelahlala apho kwezuzandi ziphindaphindayo
akwenelinye lalahlikayo yatshonela ke ngokuconela eliweni intaka yamabali

ngenye imini kibandela bam ingonyamale yakhe yaphuma izambela apho yahlangana nendlovu islambayimla njeni

neonwaba kebondonabami ngonyama kweelophala isiva kamnandi idanisa hleka njantle loo nto yatsho ingonyama bantonabam
akwaba nambendinomboko njengawendlovu yamkekebandonabam ingonyama kelondaw ishiyeyindlovu idlala ampho emlanjeni ibheka ngasehlathini ingonyama kele yanyusayisanda sayo yazisanga

yatsho engonyama ijonge phezulu yintoni yabuza indulamthi ndimu ngonyam
isithi thu phakathi kwemithi mmh mola ngonyam yatsho intlulamthi mola intlulamthi
didjelawuxolo ngokileka kuwe benzama ukuba noboko ufana nowentlofu
kanti andijonganga apho ndiyakhoni intoni ngumboko u ofana nowendlofu yabuza indlu lamthi
aw yamangalisa omboko bendlova iindlov iya zitshiza ngamanzi ikhe iziqhamo emthini ngombokowayo
iphinde yentsayingolwe mnandi enkunu ngombokowayo yathwe ngonyamba ntonabam iqalala kaloku indulamthi
iqalekha ele yona endlova korwa ke mandu buxalela mna ndingenza ngcono nangali yamintamo inde
yatsho iintlulamthi bantona bam njeka ntoni iintlulamthi yabusa engonyama
kaloku mna ndifikelela encokoyini yomthi apho kukwamaqabi nezintwe zinengcasa dinakho kulakaza ndawo yooomke
dibone ubungozi nolwimilwamo olo lubalekile kubalude yathreyi ndlulamthi nantsu kebandonam abamintlulamthi kubawulumlayo lude
olubala umfusa kwaye ke mandikuxele into ulwimilwam ngonyama lumelele koko ke dinakho ukutya emthini onameva imide nameva inamaqabe amnandi
yadro indlulamthi bantwana bam mm yandle loo nto ow akwaba benokubam ndenjengawo indlulamthi
ukuza ndibone ndibone ngapha kwemithi ndiyitye elomagqabi solokuthetha ngawo
ndiyafuna ukufana nawenam sugeza apha wena makwa ngawatyaagqabi soloko uthetha ngawodeyafuna ukufana nawenam sugeza apha wena makho ngawad yamaqabi
yamkake iingonyama ingena ihlathini yabeka izandla zozibini ntloko isenza laaandamo iinde yendulamthi sikabagqabi ebthini
wenze ntoni wavalambuso ngelizwezileyo yaxuma yuthukile ngonyam ntothukile
ooo kanantiqonde ukuba ndiyakuyikisa yatsho imbabala laphinde kebandona bam latsho elizwezileyo ndiyakuyikisa nako ke kuvela iinombala ungwevu nebhalhala elimhlophe ezantsi ivela phakathi ehlathini kolomatyholo
ooo imbabala yatsho ingonyama ooo uyabona wena inokubawu sisonasilwanyana sithuleyeku nazizongizilwanyana apha ehlathini yaneentloni kebandoda bamimbabala ewe unyensile ngonyam uktula
kundincede akubendihlale ndikhuselekele andisithandiso onkezinye izilwanyana zine ngxhulo
uyazi yona ndayilungileyo kuthula oh akwaba benokubanjengaweni nambabala ndithule
yathro iinkonyama ungazam kodwa umanduxelele
kuthatha ixesha elide ukubawufani nam ndakubuya kentukbone ngeneyimini ngonyama yathruba ndolabamimbabala yabuyela kwakhona ihlathini kulumatyholo
nafukabandolabamigonyama ambanguzola ihlathini jongani ke bantona bam
yayihambangenzwane ilingalisa kaloku iibhabhalaleyo akubangagala ke bantona bam naantso ingonyama ikhubeka kwakhona kwihlahlangeli nngngngngo
yeyokuwele ke phezi kwamaqabi yeva intsinezoli leivela ihlathini ingonyama kiyona yabona into bungwev itanyeza ihlathini oku kwenyamakazi
yaphakamake ngonyamba nolabam yabalaka iwiwele ihlatini eyongela endliniyayo umama waya kebontenabam wayibhale exhomayimpala
mama yatsho izolibandela bambi ngonyam
kuqhube kandone ngonyam wabuza umam kuthenukhaneleka ungunwabanje kutheni ninginaw umboko njengendlova
aye maa mkutheni ungenayo iintamo endenjengendlu lamthiwe kutheni ngena kokutsiba nokuhamba ngeentopanjengambabala mama
ooo mama zikhilele zezulwanyana umna andiziva ndibalilekile kwaphela
wagawobakebandona bam umamowo ngonyama wayibhoza ebu wunzi ngonyama mntana wam ukuba uuba ubunombo njengendlovu
beningasoze ndikwazi ukupuza xaoyoklal kwaye ukuba ubunentwamente
beningenakukufungula ndikubuke aphaizenlelizam ndikubeke apha isifubeni kuzendideleze ndidlale ujenginawe khawucingeke ukuba ke ubuthule njengebabala
beningasaza dokufumano ukuze dikwanga uya bona kukubaleka kwakho mntwana wam umamawo ngonyama bantwana bam wayisondeza iinkonyamoyake wayibeka esifubeni
wonkeke umntu unento abaluleke ngayo ngonyama mna ndikuthanda ngendlelawiyiyo kwayekum ukubalikele
ngapheziko zonkezilwanyanezilapha kolihlathi siyevan oh inklusi mamo yathwe ngonyam
ooo bantwele bom zazinawe ubalikele apho kulondawo ukuyo liphela apho ibalilethu
kodwa ke manikhumbuzi apho imakhaya bazali akunyenzilekanga kubanisolo kokalokulilindil amabali
kunomathotho lokuzo uve amabala mnandi ungazifundela ibali naninawfuna ukubake ufuna amabala maninzi okufundela bantelabakho kanye bazifundele bona
ndwandelwa unali ibali dotmumfunafuno yakho ephathwayo uyakusumanilake yingwaba yamabali ngednumezahlukeneyo simahlala

uyanyanzeleka siyambile kuzesifumane ke amadlelo aluhlaza esikuwoke mphulaphuli wezwi

awabonakala kuye wasuka khona waya intabeni ngasempumalanga ebhethela wayitwabulula intent eyakhe ebhethela ngasentshona langa asile ngasempumalanga wamakela khona isibingelelo yehovo nkula igama likayehova mphulaphuli sendifunde kakhulu uba uyaqaphela apha s uthixo uthetha nalenekeko ekuthwangu abram albongabaleko suty utwitshixo kuyo abram phuma ezweni lakowen s phuma endlwini kayihlo s shiya abantakweni uyeambezele izinto iisirawonding zizakho zimbambezele izinto eaxhelile nazaziyo zimenze angayifumani into uthixo ebemlungiselele yona ngokodwa xa ethe waphuma kuyavama ukuthu mntwana akhule ekhuliswa ukuthi uyewaphuma angasoloko eqokelele gadhiwe kugathwe kwantoni yakho kuthi zinto zingambethi kwenze kakubekoniskade lapho mntwana kufuneka kumiyeke s akabenezi bekho nizinto ezimhlithayo azokwazo komelela aphehla bathimthixo ke s umnothula kubantu bakowabo ebonwabiseni nabo nkothula kubazali s nkothula kwizislobo s kothula kwizintu azithandayo mphulaphulwasekha ngoba konizinto oye uhlale kuzo onwabunethezeke ngoba uthanda kubonakalinti obana awufuni kuhamba awufuni kuyandawo ungomnye wabanwabele ukubakule ndawo ubekele ndawo onwabele ukubakuyo unkazukhula mphulaphulwasekaowabo tibhayibhileke wathuyo hova s kwabrahamngoba uthixo unalo izwe elilelakhe afuna okuthi ulibone ibelilo s ooboniswe nguye okuthiweko
ungayinakwe yiphinin ndawo apengakhanga kubonise khona ngobazauti mazi kubethi zinto ungabinandawo yokubalekela sithibanenawe usolakantikusolumntu oye kwindawo bengakhange abizelwe kuyo nguthixo kuhleke mpulaphuli s uthi nobi abetheka enisekuba ubetheka kwindawo uthixo ebekubizeleleko s alibongu igambalenkosi s enisekisa s mphulaphuli
iindawo uthixo akubizela kuyo glonyaka njena alibongu igambalenkosi uyokhulisa igama lakho alibongo ke igamalenkosi okuqala baphulaphuli itibhayibhile funani yeenatani kwayekezonke ezizinto ezilanjelwe noba ezifunwa engabantu bonke nizokwaz ukuthi zinilandelele nezifumana ukwaz ukuzifumana usabambelele kwizinto eziindala uthixo nentwentsha afunokukhlangula akubekekuyo nendawo uthixo afunokubeka kuyo ubanjezelwa yindawo ohleli kuyo ompulaphuli wasekhaya malbongwe ke igama lenkosi xa ubeka phana kuvesto utuveskuthondikwenze uhlanga olukhulu ndikusikelele ndilikhulise igamobinkulu ucingubaseyinkulu inafu
ayikakabi nkulu kufuthixo kusakhonindawo afunukukusakuyo
ayomatiplaya adablisha aphindaphindi namba yalefemeli ocingintokubanawena seyeninzi orethi malibonga malenkosi uthuthixo ndikusikeleles s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s sesukakuthixo umdali wezunomhlaba noti intsikelelo yokuzenzela ngoba intsikelelo mpulapulwasewigambalenkosi emolweni baphulaphuli ngokwamacebo abantututixo ke ngoku
ufunu kukusakuleyakhe intsikelelo oyothuma ngabuqhamile mphulaphulasekhaya ameni

united to bepona kene nalibonkabalenkosi yaphitye ekindotu kudizisa uzalwa kanjantsi aophindela kanjani
esibelekweni sikamamacandi kule eyitshe ndikuyo kanti uthixo thethi mfihlo eyayikundi fihliwe malibonga malenkosi ngoba izinto zikathixo mzalwane zifuna ubekaantuyazi thandazela ukuzizityhileke kakuhle aphakuwe engqondweni malibonga malenkosi so united to bepona kene alibonga iinoda for you to see kod united to bepona kene s uninikotimo iiwa s confused kuthetwa okthi notu kweyiswa zalwa ngamanzu zalwe nangomoya alibonkamelekosi kuthi umasozelwe ngamazi nangomoya now uiibona kheni kshene izonozakho zicolelwe ufundiswe iikonfeshen ukonfese ngoba angekumbonuthixo ungakhange wahlambulula ulahle ubumdaka obusentlijweni naseqondweni uphilimpilo yobutsha alibongweka igama lenkosi yithikipayipilekla ithetha phathuthuzela abantu bakathixo thetha kakuhle israeli khona abantu abathetha kakubi nebandla ubonba yei lo mntu

malbonkabalenkosi mphulaphulasekhaya hlala kuye ahlale kuwe
malbonkabalenkosi sithipha eblu bangabuhlala kuwe s namazwi akhe ahlala kuye mphulaphulwasekhaya uya hlonipheka uya hlonitshwe mimoya uyothwena aphuhamba khona ingelosi ziyaleziwe okuthizize s zikugade mphulaphulwasekhaya botinb nasiphini sabatha esibekiwe sabekelwa wena
asoze sibe namandla akuphumelela ngoba wena izithepsi zakho ziodarishwa ngabaphezulu madabangabalekozo
ubona singaguqinje mphulaphulwasekhaya kwabaphantsi ngobathina sinophezulu madabangabalekozo

ezulwini bazalwane banazi engeleze eziyabadumisa zemdumisa kakhulu uthixo ingilosi zitshoke ubusukunemini azidina ngobavelo ubusukwe zulwini abukoko nwatyiwe bathandika ngegama likajiswa uwasenasaretha s itipapile kuthwa kwathiwa xaujongaphanywadi phazika isaya amenkwakha ngelumto zauthunywa ezemabeni azofelela izonozomntu kwatshuthi abasezulwiniakama ujizu waphakama umdali wezunomhlaba yaphakama iimbangi yokudlwakobomi waphakama umdala wentsuku waphakama unqonqoshe undinguye endinguye wabe kaphantsi bathandkayo iingubo yobukhosi wathi thumamna nkosi ndiye
bebe anyagushelwa engegazi lephokhwe negusha nenkomo ukuzebe nobudlelwane nenkosi okutshukuthike baphulaphuli ongefuyanga umntu ubebaselishweni loba yena abesigculelwa sokungaqoleleki izono waqondo baugiesu abantu s abamoshanga masbom benalento ethi bazaumoshe mvakoko besekuyothathwa ekidini kanyagushelwe kuthethwe nenkosiqhelwe kutshiswe kuthweke kanyagushelwa nobakoxolelaniswa umntu nothixo malbongaba nkosi s asinda amagaze bokhwe namagazi egusha ngoba igazi likayesu igazililo elagopoza ekhalivari malibongabanenkosi igazi likathixo liyathetha lisaphalala nanamhlanje
iswi likathixo ke ngokubhaliwe phakwincwadi zika yohane ndiyathanda baphulaphuli ku futisifunde kwinywathi zakhe isinoptibs books alibongaba lenkosi sifunde ke phakunwathi kayo wane utshapta futhini sifunde ke phaba zalwana uvse wana nangona apho siqonde kona thina sijongephakhu vesifutini apho entetayethu eningi ikhona masifundenenjalo ngendani celelayo nje mka ndiyakunilungiselela indawo
ukuba ke ndimkile ndiyakunilungiselela indawo ndiyabuya ndize ndinamkelele kum ngokwam okuze apho ndikhoyo mna nibekhona nani apho ke ndiyakhona mna niya kwazi nendlela niya yazi uthi utomasekuyo nkosi asazi apho uyakhona singathini na ukuyazi indlela uthi uyesu kuye ndim ndlela ndim iinyaniso ndimubomi akukhonomnyi uzayo kubawo engezingamu ukuba
bedindazile mna ningenamazile ubawo ngoku ke niyamazininbonile nokumbona athu philipi kuyenkosi s sibonise uiyihlo kosanele uthu yesukuye ndinaxesha lingakanani na ndinani nje akukandazi nafilipi lowo undibonile mna umbonilu bawo utshongani na kewena ukuthi sibonise yihlo akukholwana s mhla ukubamna ndikuyo ubawekwe akum amazwe
dwathetha yom nakuni endwathethe ephumakum ubawo ke ohlelikum nguye oyenzayo imisebenzi le kholwana ndim ukba mna ndikuye ubao nokuba uba uku m okanyeke kholwana ndim ngenkayayo imisebenzi yakhe leyo inene enene ndithi kunilowo ukholwayo kum imisebenzi endiyenzileyo mna uya kuyenza ni yena nemikhulu kunayi uya kuyenza ngokubanina s mna ndisiya kubawo
nento enithena icele egabendlam nto yeenza yona ukuze uyiso azukiswe ngonyana ukubanithe naceela into egamendlamo nto yenza mna
alibongi kama lenkosi ilapho ke bathandi ka ukubanithe naxela into egameni lakhe utshu yesu uthi ndawo yenza ee ukubonakali kuthi bathandi kayo njengoko uyesu sekeichazile vangasentla
okuthi endlwini kabawo zininzinda uzohlala uthi ukuba bekungenjalo ngeendini xelele ati ndimka kendyezulwini albonga balenkosi uyolungisa indlela baphulaphul uyolungisela uyolungisa indawo zohlala ukuzethina xa siyamba apha emhlabeni sisesifike sifumanane naye ezilwini malbongwe ke igama lenkosiukuzethina ngenye imini sikwaz ukuthi nathisiye apho akhoyo uyesuethu alikho emhlabeni singabaphezulu

s sibindlafika kwakhona abantwana bamithubhaleni enilithadekakhulu lenkqubeno ethi nali ibali

navuswa kunye naye funanike izinto zaphezulu malbonkabaleko izinto ke bathandika ezi zizinto

xa usauthe wayifumana mphulaphuli iqiniseka uya iibamba uya iibamba
uyiibamba ngazo zosibini wigade ingahambi ngoba iihamba into yaphezulu malbonkabalenkosi
itibhayibhile ke bathandikayoo ameni mawapheka pakuvesiwan s s s s s soba ulezwilona s uyesu bathaneke noba simbona evela s unyana kamarriyaphathiyena isi s kothi he was kothi albonkabalenkosi and he is still kothi he will continue to be kothi
albonkabalenkosi asikwazi wikhe notseparethu thichono yesu s bayinto enye nobabeni ngobathathu

lowo uhlwela umoya ke ovuna ubomi obunguna phakade
ngokwasemoyeni ke ek ekwenzeni okulungileyo masingethi mandla kubasovuna ngexesha elililo kuba s asityhaa ukuba asityhafu njengoko singathi siwenethuba masisebenze okulungileyo kubo bonke ngokokodwa ke kwabendlu yokholo niyayiva le nto bapulaphula zizikoni indawo apha endithandayo ezindisikelelayo mnangengangoku ubauthelane nalowo ufundisayo ngeento zonke ezilungileyo ame mphulaphuli mkhonzi nguwe albonkwiqa malenkosi kwenklesha ubesizecaweni engaphilanga kwenklesha ibanjwe zingxaki ezokhlala ezefemeli kodwa azam ukuzlungisa ezlungiselela intokokubana makafike kuwe albonkwiqa malenkosi manje sefikile kuwe uphelilunyake kunyamezele yintoniwena ombongangayo ekukunyamezeleni kwakhe ixesha elingaka iitipapile makathofundiswayo abelane naloofundisayo ngezinto zonke ezilungile yintoni leentto thina xa kufanele basimbonge umntu kathixo
isikele ntwe beprlungu kangakazintlijwe nasezinqondwenizwana bakathixo kwanikelu yesu yena qala iintoni le ntokuba khona bantabalwayo namaxesha woba kuselebrathwe nkokheli kusube kuluhloboluni lwabangenwe moyamni bebelihlizwe beshunyayezwa unyaka lowonke ntoni ngoku ebenzababe nomona okuthu umntu kathixo akwazuba athengisephu ohlambi mpahla ebezibila phamngwakhe inya unyaka lowonke kutheni le nto kuzabanzimuba umtoshumelayo kubenzima nditshintobanaana akwazuthenga nditshimpahla zabantwana akugqebinitoba ebesima phambwebandla likathixo elisikelelwe kubakuyavamo kuthabantu abayingxaki kwintsikelelo yobakusikelelo mfunisi ibe ngababantu abanezinto mphulaphuli khumbulu kuthi le nto onayo awithathanga kwizinto kuthwena wehle nje uvele unayo kanyelwa alibongambalinkosi wena ubuvele widizeva kodwa yonkinto onayo u yamkelisiwe kuzabanzima nje okuthi uyishirishi itibheblehe kengusenga sathathilebe kumelbuyithathile umnikezeyona athathe eyakhe ezokwenz nttoba ukhalekathi nguwe uye waba nempilo yokuvimba akugqibinto obuthixo wakuphona lobubumi obuphilayo obuphiwe kwabona khona bantabavuka bengakwazukuthetha khona bantabavuka bengakwazukupifumla wenu yavuka yahambi anyathela akho kw kwantwektho ushodangayo kothwa urhuleka nje okuthi enkosi mntuqathixo umphatheli envelope enkosi mntuqathixo esisibusiso eso kuwe malibongaba lenkosi ngoba osikelelayo uyasikelelwa s kanjani ungasikelela
s ayichhomekeka ngakubantwabanezinto kuphelinda bayokupha
uya kwazo kuphiwa okokuphiwe nawe ungaphaqa upha s uya piwa
koni sikhitha abantabangayaziwa inti okokubana aphekutyaleni kukholo uvuna
awkwazi ukuthabantu betibetyala betyalumbone masiminuskewenu sonkizandla uwambi yodla udle nalo mbe uqhibe uexpecta into baqabevuna nawoza yemaseminiyo vunantoni ungakhange walima kuyalinye mphulaphulethi one rand kuye umntu osikelelweyo aphathi one rand uthuyopha umntu kathixo malibonga ngambalenkosi yihlobo lunilontsikelelo elioolimemezayo kanyolikhwazayo kuthixo okuthakakusikelele ngalo uzamonti okuthiweni uthixo eonatomaka sikelele ngayo iinobazezi wandrenda onikelanga yempulapulwaseka sokhaqha ulwazi kuthumntu makazi into kokubana umvuzo koniminyakezayo ngayaziyo malibonkabaleko njemukhulisa bantwana nje koniminyaka ezayo ongayaziyo ozawubelapho s uncappable ukwazi ukuzenzisinto ngokwakho malibonkabaleko athutixo ekwenzeni kwakho kuhle s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s ss thixo yabakhumbula abantwana khumbolisizukulwana bazi babuzana abantu kweenzekantoni kilefemeli le nto yasikelelwa ngohllobo esikelelwe ngayo hayi

amagama onyana bayo babengomaloni nokhilyono babengama efrathe asebheteleyem yakwayuta
bayake elizendla kamowaphi baba khona wafau elimeleki indoda kanawo washiywa ke yena nonyana bakhe bubabini bazeka abafazi abangabamo
abikazi ngamalomnyi yayingu opha ngamalomnyi yayingu ruthe bahlala khona iminyaka eseshumini
bafaka nanjalo bubabini s oomaloni nokhilyoni washiywa ke umfazi ngonyanabakhe bubabini naindoda yakhe wesuka yena nomolokazanabakhe ebuya elizwini lakamowaphi ngokuba eeve eselizweni lakamowaphi ukuba yehova ubevelele abantubakhe ngokuba nika isonka waphumakulondawo ebekuyo enomolokazana bakhe bobabini
wahamba ngendlela ebuyele ezweni lakwayuta wathi unawumi komolokazana bakhe bobabini hambani nibuyile elo endluniyonina
yehova makanenzele inceba njengokonenzengako kubafina kum yehova makaninike nifumane indawo yokuphumla
elowo endlwini endoda yakhe wabanga baliphakamisa izi labo balila bathikuyayisi yakbuyela nawe kubantu bakoweni
wathu nawumi buyane zintombizam kungani na ukubani yambe nam disenonyana yinina embiliniwam ukuzebabe ngamadoda kuni
buyane zintombizam hambani ngokuba sendi kwalupele ukuba nendoda khona ukuba ndibendisithi ndisenethemba s nokubenditenda s bangonendoda ngobubusuku nokuba bendithena zala oonyana beniyakuthi ngengxayo nilinde bade bakhule yini na
beniyakuthi ngengxayo nizibambe ningabi namadoda yini na ayinisintombizam ngokuba kuhraxha kunene kumngengayeni kuba isandla skayehofa siphumelele nam baliphakamisa izwi labo babiye balila
hopha wamanga uninazala keye uruthe wana mathela kuye wathi ena uyabona mkhonzazana wakho ubuyele s kuthiqobixo bakowabo buyanawo ulandela mkhulwa kaziwakho wathu ruthe mosuku ndibongoza ngokuthi mandakushiyeni ndibuyeni ndingakulandeli

ophizijenga ngokolawulayo phezikomhlaba umoya oinkwele athi mayethetha ngayi yesu athi uyaunazisa nezinto endingakhange ndanazisazona umoncwele uuyena oya wamba umsebenzi omkhulu kunomsebenzi awanjiwe inkosi yesu ngobauyawuthi esemelika abelapha kwelilethu izwe ngexeshe linye atesetshayina abelene ezimbaphe ngexesha elilodwa s akanam linganiselo s kanalimithi yaphokuthwa useza ulindo akhwelitreni okanye akhwelibhasa kanye upleni noobakhona kwindawo abambizakuyo ngelocesha baphulaphuli bomhlobo okanye baphulaphuli berredo ekhephulbhiti malibongambale nkosi s ningabahlobo bethu baphulaphuli ngabahlobo bethu sinithanda kakhulu ukuthisibela baphakati kwenu siziswe ukuthisenithanda malibonkabalenkosi masifunde enike baphulaphuli iipayipile yethu sizokwazi basifumanek isixloko sezwi likathixo namhlanje phaya itiipayipile phaklandawo kwiinwadi zabasefilipi besibini s safuna kuviswana aphoese ophelelakhona ngokuvesi ndineshobapha kuvisi iileveni singagqithela ke mhlambe xa ikoni ntwesputshela akubeni siyofika phakutweefu malibonka malenkosi ithisloko salapha emawifunda lephabelitko umzekelo wolulamo nokuzinama kukayesu athi kebathani uvc vwathi esibumeni bukathixo akathi ulinganakwakhe okunothixo kulixhoba usuke wazihluba wathabatha ubume bomkhonzi enziwe wafana nabantu wathi ngeemo efunyenwe enjengomntu wazithoba wanga ngolulamileyo wada weso ekufeni ukufake kwasemngamlezweni
kungoko athe uthixo wampakamisa kakhulu wamnika igama elingaphezu kwaonke amagama ukuze ngegama lika yesu onke amadolo agobe awasemazulwini nawasemhlabeni nawabaphantsi komhlabaveni malibongwikhama lenkosi aphabathanikayo inkosi izama ukuveza okanye iveza ukuphakama kwenkosi inkosi iveza ukuphakama kwenkosi uthixo uveza ukuphakama kukathixo phezu kwabantu malibongwi kamaelenkosi apha uyesu xa isizemhlabeni
tibayibhile wafika abathanika kwasekuprofetiwe ngaye kwathwa iyeza inkosi iyamajuta inkosi yehlabathi wathatazela ke baphulaphuli uerote njengokosi ke sayyifunda ngabanye kungenze ngambahla mba abayazi kodwa uyerote yamenza wagungqaloo nto esihlalweni sokuwayihleli kuso ukuva ubaukhona ozayo oweza obayikumkani yamajuta kuba yena yayinguyi kumkani wayikhona isaziwa ehlonitshiwe so indoda libehleli khamfati s tulwisayo ingasabheka ngubakhonumtonokufika ayicuthe iindawo iihleli kuyo siyazike baphulaphuli kuthi izikhundla zonke eziphezi komhlaba zialwelwa zialwelwa politikali zialwelwa ecaweni zialwelwa echlaleni baphulaphuli kufabantu bebulawa ukuthi s suswabesuswa ezikhundleni kwindaw zonke baphulaphuli akululanga ukuyishiya iipozishini okuyo abantu bayayilwelela iipozishini albonkabalenkosi
pozishini ke bathanga sikhumbuluba yiyole eyabangelokuthi usathane alahlwe sesamile sesebenze kakhulu eluncedo oluhlezulinukothwi posishini
aye wayifuna ewaqanelwe iipozishine ngaphezu wepojishini ayinikeziwe nkuthixo intliziyo ke yobugrithi ekhona ke bazalwane kwiindawo zonke leentliziyo etiphaiphile nazintweni zonke zilondolozwayo la londoloza intliziyo yakho ngoba ithi kulapho amathende obomi ephumakhoni akhohlisa ke baphulaphuli intliziyo ikhohlisa ithe ikhohlise nomnikazwayo iingameyelisela s oyaliselwa nje ligqana elingaphantsi likomzimbawakho kodwa ikudisive wenze izinto ezikhohlakeleyo uzisole xa sekwenze wangena kodwa ikudisiwe wenzwe izinto ezikhohlakeleyo uzisolle xaiseyikwenze wangena komajele yakwenza waphulukana namanye amalungu omsimbawakho kanti uyewaphuswa iintliziyo baphulaphule kuninze kwenzeleyo ke esibonayo phandlapha kusenzeka uombayelena into yenziwe ngumntu oongakhanga sebenze ngqondokodwa oyewalawulwa yintliziyo ekhatha ke intlijoyakho mphulaphuli wasekhaya ujyesu ke apha bazalwane uya phakaniswa s lizulu phezi komhlaba ithibepile phakunayeni kungoko atheutixo wampakamisa kakhulu amnika igama elingaphezu kwawo onke amagama s akeekhoke bazalwane omnye umntu onikwe elohama khona amagama madod akho amagama ekumkani zomhlaba khona amagama b s aguguquakuwo phezi ngomhlaba magamenyangi amagama osazwayo s ekhwaziselepreetha magama epresident s malibonga malikusa amadam abantu abazwayo okuthibanga agqirha ukhlala abanyengababulali alibongabalekosi
amagama maninza amagama abantu bazalwane abathiwewona s bahlelikulo kodwa labobantu ubukhulubecala nokuthi bonke bazaufabalishiye ihlabathi end amathambabo azawushieka encwabeni malibongabalekosi kodwi nkosi yetujiswa aphosimbonga khonokuthiyena s wanyukanawo awakamathampo njengoko wayeyewathembisa wathi kodwa emva kweentsukwe ntathu ndizawubiya ndivuke malibongabalenkosi bathanikayo s babakhofuzi dabantu xa bezim kuthi bamazi nokuthi bamve uolo aphezwe s komhlaba onke zonke lwimi zixele ukuba yona inkosi uyesu s uinkosi yehlabathi athike uvesteni ukuze ngegama likayesu onkamadola khobe awabasemzulwini na awabasemhlabeni na abaphantsi komhlaba eemolweni baphu laphulu kutshu kuthi bazalwane khona abantu abasezulwini khona abantu abaphansi komhlaba njengobani bona ababantu enibabonayo nje abasithi ngoku malibonkabalenkosi s ndibayipileke uthixo utshisumnikeze iothorithi sauthetha kibazalwana phantsi kwesi s hlokwesithi uyesulo uinkosi baphulaphuli uinkosi zulwini uinkosi emhlabeni
uinkosi nangaphantsi malibongi ekhambale nkosi ongamadolo inkosi ithi makagobe makagobe amadola kathasekukuthi s ukubani s akukhathasekukuthi uwaziwa ngantonu dumengani ubeluncedo lungakanani phezigomhlaba abantuba kudumisa kangakanani kodwa igamalakho albekwanga yinkosi ukuthi zewonk umntu opezigomhlaba alphakabise siyababona bantu bathandu phakanjiswa ibe inkosi ithi abaphakaniswayo kweli bazawutotywa kwelayi thikayepilezi thobeni ke esandleni somusa ukuzeinkosi uyesu iniphakamise ngexesha elililo bayehlulwa ke bathandi kaya bantu behlabathu kuthi bavumele uthixo abaphakamise bathandi ziintwe zibonwayo ngaloo mzuzi zinto ke eziphelelo eziphinde ziphelelo malibongabalenkosi
utima ofunda ke bathani kayo uvs 11 uti ziti zonkelu zixelela ukuba yesu krestu iinkosi kuzekuzukiswe uthixo uyise emolweni baphulaphuli s bkhilippiti malbongaba lenkosi esimele bazalwane simele

esingathando kuthi sibeyiyo kodwa simelwe thina okuthisi simphakamisi yesu
iinkosi simphakamise simphakamisisimo sivuma simphakamisisimo sigavumi simphakamise kwelxesha leprotection malibongaba lenkosi simphakamise kwwexesha bantu bengenwe ngumoya umbi wokuthandimali simphakamise ke xesha labaqhankalazi uphakamise uyesu ngoba uyesu akanalo ixesha akanasizini umele aphakanyiswe zonke zizinto malibongabaleko s izibona zisenzeka azenzekeli into kokubanathina s sirhuqe inyawo kanyesibuyumva ekbeni simphakamisi yesu
kodwa simele simphakamise itshwebhwebhile ithi kumelwa phakaniswe njengomo se ephakamisa iinyo kayobhethu malbongaba naye unyana womntu umelwe aze aphakanyiswe malibongo kebathani igama lenkosi andazwi baphula phula ngoba ayikwenyintothina enokusenza siphumelele ngaphandle koba esiphakamisigama s lakayiswa ligama bazalwane elingena phakathi kwamadimuni liwabethe athisa lingene phakathi kwabathakathi libabethe bathisa lingene emalibongaba lenkusezindlini lifike s libeki oda igama likayeso kukwa amagama bekiwe namisiwe alikhwigama elinamandla njengegama likayesu liloivulela kalokubaphulaphula basekhaya imisebenzabantu bliphilise abakhulayo kanti linamandlo xolela nditsho nezono zethu liqhawula imithi emisedariya selibhanon ilizwi balikathixo bazalwane ngegama likajesu kumelwe zonke lwimi kumelwe ongamadolo aphakamise ukulunga kwakhe malibongabane kosu s ukuwama ukwazupakamisisandla s utshukumisenitsho umnwe omnyee alibongabane khonabantu abafunayo kutshukumisizandla kodwa abakwazi mphulaphulwasekhaya wena uneenceba iseprivilejsi thicukwenzela okuthina mhla nje wena ube usakwazi ukuphakama umdumis uthixo umenzemkhulu kwazi uthatinya uzakuyotshona kwindawo funukiyakuzo alibongaba lenkosi kubwayo ngabantu baqhutshwe ngeewilbharo abanye baqhutshwe s ngezantsizitulo s ektwaziwiwi s shema alibonkabalinkosi abakwazi kuzihambela nguyesu bazalwane okwaziyo uguwambi somntu mpulapulwasekhaya yathando kuxelele kutinamhlanje usenyeebeni yoba uzova ukulunga kathixo uzova ukuphakama nokcedakala komntu olahlakonkukonakala kodwa asondele kuyesu amphakamise abeyinkosi nomsindisi wempilo yakho mphulapulwasekhaya ungazizama zonkizinto uyawulahlekelwa xa ungenakwazuba ubuyele kuyesu ngobethi phephile ubanithe nabuyela kumna wakhiwa nguye sekuya bona kalake ukuthi izitukuthuku zethu albonkama lenkosi zipheleleke ezinweleni malbonkama lenkosi

kubuyesu ukuphila bazalwano
akukho kunyukphila ngaphandle koba ukphila kwethukuyesu wasenazaretha albonga yeonandawo yokubaleke latina bazalwano
kulaphosi kwazu catsha khona kwidgalaba elibanzi malibongabalekosi othizani nonk enibulaleke enisindwa ngumthwalo
atindininikeze ukuphumla malbongabalinkosi atithabathani ijoko yamnithwa lathingoba
umthwalo wam umthulula uthinejoko lamfuthi limnandi malbongabalinko uthindo ifumanela ke ukuphumla imiphefumlo yeno
bazalwane sibonabantu apha bezidlisapilisa banyabezichoma ngesizathu soba
bangqatyele kukwazi ukuthi iiproblemzi namadepreshenzi ababambene nao netresisi ayikwindawo abangayo yethula kuzo
kodwa apha uyesu uthi free of charge uthizani nonk nenanibuleleka enisindwa ngumthaleni zoninika ukuphumla bathandika
uphumla kukho ke bazalwane phezigomhlaba ngaphandle koba uphumlelala kuye nawe s uhlale kuye malbongama lenkustu nafundawemvelo sikwa ngabantwana benqumbo njengabanye abo
iya iva ndalento baphu laphu itibhayi le thina besifudula singabantwana benqumbomalibonga malenkosi kubekona le nto ekuthwa s kubekona ithinento s ucolelwaniso phakathi kwethu nothixo malibonga malenkosi amenu kwenzelba uthixo athixa esizemhlabeni eze abenoncumo kubekona abantu adibana nabo kubekona isharing aza uyenenza kufezakale laaanto wayeyidale umntu kwasengqaleni kumbulana baphulaphula kuthi phaya kwincwadi zegenesiska lokuthixo ubeli vizithela ihlabathi ngoba bekhona abantu bakhe phayekthongo ademno efa emanokuza alibongabalekosi kodokutwa itibhayi plecahu adame esidla emthini yena nomkakhe alibongabalekosi babaleka bayo zifihla emva kuba beveluba nangu uthixo esiza s iziyustu vizite malibongabalekosi wayisiza yena esizwizwali kodwa esiza manje esiza ebantwini asebemoshide
ubayale lumthetho kuthi zeningadli kodwa bona bawephulu umthetho balephula izwi likathixo bamamela ilizwi lenyoka malibonga malenkosi zingaphi yinyoka namhlanje ezibakhupha yabazalwane ekuthini bayenzi intando kathixo kodwa benze intando yenyoka mpulapuli yonkinto ethetha agaist iwiil nokuchazelwa nenenemigomo kathixo yazikakuhle kuthi loo nto izele ukuthi uuxabane nothixo izokuba malibongaba lenkosi okuthi ufe ungenathixo etikibheble ephakutshaphthatheni kwiincwadi zikayihwane isela aliyizike
lingezelanga ukuze libe libulale beseliatshabalalis atiyena mnandizele
ukuzebabe nobomi nabomi obugqetisileyo yesubazalwane xaifika pesikomhlaba ufikeli kuthi azosinikezubomi ebesesahlukene nabo malibongabalinkosi nkokubiyela yesu itiphebhele nawakhiwa abukhubomi bazalwana ngaphandle kuba umntu asisebenzele s ngomkelu yesu abenethikitiphezwe komhlaba amazwe yesuba uyinkowo sinomsindisi wobomi bakhe malibongabalinkkosi ubangaba malibongabale nkosi zawothicingitobana

badunyiswa ngabanye malibongabale nosi banale ngqondo yocingi ntobana bangakwazo bakhusela bantu yeenguyesu yetwa umntokwazukhusele umntu malbongabalenkosi ngobanoba ungayiqhunyisa loo nto kuthwa utuqhunyiselifemeli akho ukuze amagqwiratima esiza afike kunuka le nto ifakaphendlwini malbongabalenkosi umoya walento oto oifakehlini oviyazi uza wambu wambu hele into hours time abuye ibuyimimoya ifikucinezele ngamandla ucinezelele nalentiyobana ukwa yilibazisa wayilindi saphandle malibonga balenkosi kodaxa efik uyesu mzalwane olivumbe limnandi malibonga ngabalekosi kwabakholwayo kodwa ukuphlungu malibongabalekosi kulabo abasebenziso bumntaka foro kotheka abantwana bakathixo malibongabalekosi edibhapile ilisolakhe elibheke ukukhala kwabancwele yizawashelthabazalwane s esizifihla kuyo xa sibalekela sibalekela ongendawayikhwenyindawo ke mphulaphuli wasekhayeni ndicebisitobana balekela kuyo xa unyakuphela malibongabanenkosi kubankhwenabantu bazalwane abaye kanti njengbuphelunyakanje kanti kuzawuphela nobomi babo mpulapulwasekhaya malibongabanenkosi amendi
akuthandu kuxelela xa ofumenu yesu fumene iothorithi malibongabalengosi singothixo tiphepile anizazina ubanina ningothixo malibongabalengosi aafumenu yesufumene igunyamzalwane ungayithathe liphantsi ndaba yobakhonabanzi bizoyesi labo bantu banobomi malibonga manekosi banabo kuleli baphinde
banibevinobomi nakwelizayo malibonga bale nkosi mphulaphulwasekhaya ungaliweasty ixesha lakho malibonga bale nkosi ulikhitele ezintwenesi zawophineziphele
kodwa likhitele kwinto engapheli mphulaphulwasekhaya zikhonilizintwe zyezi bonakala mehlweni ntu zibengadi zizinto eziza usonwabi sekomzuzwane kodwa ndiyathando kucela lamphulaphulwasekhaya okuti ispelo sezo zinto ukuba ngaba asinathixo siyamba ihamba siyambe siyobasibi sibe ligazi sibezinyebezi malibongambale nkosi ngapha kwenywaba itibhayibhile khona udivas nesityebi malibongabalekosi thwa omny ebikade pesikomhlaba esidla kwiinguqu ezwele afleni malibongabalekosi esime zigethini ecelukuhla malibongabalekosi thwakoni ndothi bencimba ezibetsha mbece pesikomhlaba kanti ieyalibibala okuthi malbongamene kosi kuzawofeki xesha loba iyame pesikomhlaba ilibele zizinto ezelphakade ezawamba ziyambezpele ilibele kuxayiselabantu ngeempahle s ngibayo ilibele kuxayiselabantu ngeemotwe qhubayo ilibele kuxayiselabantu ngezindlwe hlalakuzo ilibele uqhayise labantu ngemalenazo needucations
ezinazo ezazinto mpulapuli ewe ziintle kodwezwezintwa soze ziuthathe ziokubeka ebukumkaneni bukathixo
iintweza uthatha yokdibansa nothixo okuthwa mkelu yesu etibhayi phide bazalwane nkxwadi yeshilelo ndimemnyango ndiyanqonqozo thububani uyathanda makevule utango leentlijwe yakhe ndizawo ngena ndidle bazalwano yeso esimkonzayo ulinene akazifosi emntwini uyanqonqoza ibeenguwe wena mntu oluvayo oyivaywi nokatshiso inokaphaphahle malbonkabalekosi ibeenguwe omvulelayo malbonkabalekosi bathalwa ssokhwakuselekiwe yazga kuhle mphulaphuli okutikukhwana abantu yesu ee alibongamana efuna afuna abahambe bevele malibongabaleko zibathani zigqibo besenganeno komhlaba malibongabaleko ingekafike mihla yokuthi nabo bahlukane negazi malibongabaleko zephezi komhlabampulapulasekhaya uyathandwa kwonomhlabele lotshoyo ephakumacilongo othi buya mntwana buya buyelekhaya athiwenu sathandwa uhlale lwekhaya
atisebe kubhekile abalapha yamphulaphuli wasekakwi ngxaki obambenazo akhontwe zakunceda ngaphandle kobuncedwe liliyizwi likathixo mphulaphulwasekhane yesu inkosi ke bazalwane yesu yamkelu yesu indlela yesububomo yesu indyaniso
omile bazalwane ongagungqe malbongabanekosi othitanikholwa ubanikennathi ukholo olulweni langa rezulu kwemostathi malbongabanekosi kwesidi weemostathi albe uthinauti kulezintaba kuhlukani uthizide ndintaba zimamelukutsho kwezuleni ngobazalwane ilizwileni ncani kholuthixo ulenza bebhoti ulenza lidale mphulaphulasekhaya ushlutswa ngabantwana abangamameli abanye bayaropa balimazabantu bebelabantu malbongamalekosi abanye baphuma ngeefestile malbonkabalekosi uhlelka phungu phezikomhlaba malbonkabalekosi kangangentobana unaestresi njengamange uyakhula mpulaphuli wasekhayi ikwenyindawo ongabalekela kuyo kaphandle koba usondele kuyesu nguye umazi weentlijwe zabantwana bakho kuyongatshintsha ukonakala kwabo kuyongakunikezi ubomi nabomi mzalwane
ungathi ubangaba ngakusondele kuye ungayiboni ntuthixo angakwenzela yona ungazi uthi ekuthetheni wakho uthidalqithe keshala ndalqithe lengazini kakikoni nto yayinokwazi kundincedaphulwasekhaya sizoncedana nauthixoke

benisezi ukuba amabali afananifestile esikhobisakulizwe kunyakenembonozetho umhlobo wethu newo uyafumanisa kukhulu kulezolethu
wokufunda nje iincwadi phulaphulake elibali ngokbalwa nguviyanfandar elithi unewo kunye nelizwe likhulu
uneewo bantwana bam wajongangefestile yegumbilakhe loqilala ejongestaladweni esasemanzi ngalsistalato esosnombala ongwevu abantu ke abangwevu enqamile apho imbula iqalela nabandla akazanga kwazi ukuphumele ngaphandle kwayi wayisele eyifundile leencwadi kumbali kanye ke bondana bamgelo xesha nanko ebonawomakhulwakhe phandle kulomo yawavuthuzayo ingwale zipaphatheka waye pete into inyeke intu yayibonwa kunawwe kukuba le nto iphetho kumakulu impacayayingumnyango wamomkhulu kwilizwe likhuulwawasekibandwana bam wavlencwadi umakhulu
kuba baluqala kwakho imifanikisi yendawo entle kakhulu yayikude kunalandawo iinkwevu indalu yayintle iluhlaza daka nabugolide
kukho imithi emihle mikhulu apho ngaphezulu ke kokho isibakabhaka isinombala omhle umhlaza kunyenelulanga elihle elimthubi eligatye izantsi
yo ingaba inyani le wabuza unewo wasuka wanciuma omakhulu oho akwazina ne wo onke amabali ayinyani ukuba uyakholelwa nje kuwo watho omakhulu bandodorabamwa wazo ulatha kulondawo ilaphokelophepha
apho kokokhwenkwenkwana encinciya yiphantsi uklingano newo yayamba ngasehlathini ngethuba ke umakhule funda iincwadi
wasuka yena uneowabiwabutongo wathi isezindabeni kolo lizwile hlel nomhlaba umdaka wafika kwilizwe lihle elikhulu
wevakhe ilizwi apho emadlelweni sithi yajwe indaka nyini oh intle mean yajwe nyenzane isengap isengam hlalwa
wasebeza umoya usitsho apho kulongcainde wasuka kewonewa kumbula obungwevuna loomvule ngalela kakhulu
etsinga ukuba anganjani xa inophumela ngaphandle kodwa kebandwana bam aphakwibali ungenza nayiphina into
kwakunge komvula waphuma ke unewo esizangakilonca intle inde intyo qalwa ibonayo into ende enombala umdaka
eommeleleyo inomzimba weplanga inengalo ezinde ezinombala umdaka iintlok eekulu
inwelezayo ngathi ziluhlaza ezaziphapazela ngumoya umnandi wathi unevo moya ewateqa amihlo akhe uyinda ndingomthi
dikona yonke into entle ngangapha kwamathafa bukwalide yizasokjonga kunye watsho umthi kebandana bam waziwa gwencela naye uneewokuloo mthi
wafikelela kumasebe aphizulu unewayibona nesiphelelo selizwe
kwaye kokho izinto s neenziphakude ezinye zazimenze oyikexa ecingangazo kodwa umthi wawomkusele waziwasebeza umthi wathi
hamba uyuxhaz labakho unguyiki lihleli zolibonleyo likhulu wehleki bandarabamunewe apho wankumlakulonga ipakamileyo
ngokhawuleza ke wafikelela kwisande inamatye nemingunye eminngini
imbovaneke zabalisa ibalilazo ngamadlelo kunye namahlathi iintaba kunyenedolophu zazilapu kwophu
um amabala ma ngaka wakhoza esitsho unewo maninzi amabali
njengenkwenkwezi esipakapakeni zaphendulakhe imbova nebandona bam waphamisa isandlasakhe unewe ebhaphayisa

walandelake umlambo ke apho phakathi kweentaba
wababini baqhubeka iminikwadi kwafuna kuhatyele wade unewo wafikelela engakhoyini entabayiphakamileyo
wathi xaelapho wabonayidolophu enxengxingi eeyayintle kukhlanjwa imvula kukhweelangaty ilalikha nyesile

eqibeleni ke unewangena ngefestile apho kwakhleli umakhulu enengalo ezomeleleyo nenwele izisinyeneyo okukwalama sebe makhulu obuthi
wasuka ke umakhulu wagobamadolo waphuze ekweyakhe esithi newo usikubenzolo mzukulu ulale kamnandi

ngelokhlasha ke inciniba yayinentamo emfutshane bantokabam okungathi yeyempangele wawusixa ukude ukangela apho
ukwesezana uncinema abengathi sisiduli somhlaba bakhethe ke lomhlaba oneengca emfutshane kubaka lokukudala kwiingqepha kamileyo

iindlovu ke nabantwana bam yaziwa ngombokowayo omde
elibalike lisixelela ngokuba yawufumananjani umbokowayo iindlovu ngobalwa ngubeveli nidu
kudaladala kebandonabam ezinye izilwanyana zezengakhangeleki ngelihlobo zikhangelekangalo ngoku ezinyekezezi lwanyana yayindlovu undoo uyabona ke eqaleni undoowe nempomlo emfutshanekangendlela yaemfutshane ngayo impomlo yakhe
wayixaha kona ukutya oku indlovu zazengakwazo kufikelela imagqabeni anabithekayo aphezulwe mthene
kwaye kwakunzima ukubaizilwanyana ezinkulizwe kwazo kugoba impomlo emfutshane yengeiyodwa ingakizajongeneneyo indluvo
kelokubandulabam iindlovo kufunekazisele amantsi amaninzi yeyi bayingxaki ke xa kufunekazi
guqephantsi zisele amantsi emthonjeni kwabanzi makakhuuluxa ilixesha lembalela
kuba kaloku amanzi ayiludaka kwaye incasa yawo heengadi intlabathi kwadi ke ngomnye unyaka emvenukwenyanga kunganimvula umhlambi wendluvu wanyuka intaba unyethemba lokuba uzakufumanemanzi ethafeni bonwabakakhulu xapebonamfanekiso omenyezelayo wamanzi qelele yelitshibi wakhaoleza okwenenelomhlambi behamba begilana ngelileqa kwelucibi wathi undo yeke nanga mantsi zethikexazazqalisa ukugoba iindlovu zafaka impomlozazo emanzini
iingwenyakelambe okwenene yajwekhwa yazaiceleni kwendlovu ezo yaveza imehlo linye yajonga iindlovu s iyehlelele kwezinye iindluvu
yaveza amazinyo ayo abukhali ingwenya undo wobanomsindo kakhuwu wathi ninto nobangela ukuba ixhexongo luhlobo lengweni
utheni ingafunu ukuba sabelani ngamanzi khona kutheni hlekisa ngampumlo yamje wabuza undo
ingwenya kebandona bam yayizama kutsala undo ngeenzame zokufuna angeni emanzini undona ye azitsale kuboengafuni kungeni emanzini
waza ma ukubaleka korakekukona into engumagaliso yathi yenzeke undo weva impumlo yakhe xe
le kankceni ne iye ibande yatsale kake bantwana bam yayeka kuba impumlo emfutshane
kwathi emvenkwe thutyana yabayimpumlo ende ilangakela lisele libo umfu yingwenye ziva iphelelwa lithemba kubakaloku yeingazuxifumana isidlo sangedinala esindlof
ingwenya ke yeelungisa imihlathi yayo undowabhekela kuyo ezinyeke indlovu zasondela icaleni kwendlovu indinane
zizama kwiingceda blemfazwe kora kezantisakubona kuba impumlokando iinde
ekelela nga yeselisa undo waziva enumisinto kakhulu ngakubixwaye bona isithunzisakhe emanzini
hekuhlungu kwaye yeenayi nendawuthambileyo waziqhelanisake kwabanye uxabakhe babemthento ngamehlo buthukile
kanyeke mnukebandwana bam undo wakqalisa ukufunda indlela yoksebenzi empumlwe yakhe okanye omboko wakhe waqalisa ke uqokelela amagqabi aningcasa asemajokujokwini emthini kwaye wayikwazi nokomba ingca
ezinyeke ndlovuzayi zayiqaphela intoyalempumlu ekwambelwe xesha endawo nekubakhe zeyehleke ngoku leendlo vinkxinane zaqala zarhala impumlo nkando niyabuneke undana bam wayeqhayisa ngezindakwanzi kuzenzanga lempumlo yakhe undo zaqalisakhe ukumanezi nyamalala ipsoku nezinye indlovu ziti xa zibuya exeni zibuyenazo zinampumlo eziiiiindee
yo safunda namhlanje bantona bam ukuba kutheni iindlovu zinemiboko emidenje

ooo ingwenkala ingwenkala kebandwana bam itshitha
ingwenkala yayizingela kebandwana bam yeyambaka niyininci okuzeke umhlambi wezilwanyana ungabinakho kujotsha zive ivumbalayo
yashukuma ke ngobulumko okuze umhlambi wezilwanyana ungayiva nokuyiva yarhobuloza ngaphantsi enceni okuze umhlambi wezilwanyana ungayiva nokuyiva yarhubuluzi angaphantsi enceni ukuza umhlambi wezilwanyana lowo ungamboni
umzingeli ke yena wayibona ingwenkala isondela ngokusondela apho klomhlambi wezilwanyana yalinda kebandana bami ngwenkala ukuze elinyekela mabhati libekeleka nkincwezinye izilwanyana ibadikebandana bam sisiprngboko

latshayi heko umamawo ngonqalakewa yunwabilekakhulu ukuphindafuma nabantona bakhe konto akhe zonke ezoyuro wayelilangazo

ngolesbini ekupepadi isipatshila sempumagoloni kanti ngole zithathu yiphepha the times lakwazulnatali khauteng nasentshona kapa
ngolo zine ekupepala sebayi empumagolone kuthwayi heralds spinesibone kwakhona kwixesha elizayo nisale kamnandi
thibulisileke kozondawo niphulapleni kuzo ibalitla namhlanje lethi kutheni iinkawu zihlala emthininje
ngokbalwa ngunikiwebho sondelani ke nali ibali kudalaki bonguntu zabam ingonyama yayinkosi zilwanyana

khawomeke ncinge ifakala imbeka khulu yajwe ngonyama

yaquma inomzindo apho yakubonakuba yinkawu yibophele ngomsila apho emthini kwakwa isukuma apho bantonabam
iqume ngonyama izama ukuziphuncula kwakungola intambo iqinagamandla

yathwe ingonyama zesakhala isisusayo bantwana bam labonakala kodwa intshonco elinokudideka yathembe soza nikutye

ooo ingwenkala ingwenkala kebandwana bam itshitha ingwenkala yayizingela kebandwana bam

niyabona ndizakuli yala ngamanqina amngoku isela yathrho engonyama liyakuthi xalitswini okanye likhala kubandlityhalile kulapho yakuphuma khona amanzi kora ke koba liyishwa nangolayisele lalisela likhukumeleli likhulu ngoku lalimitsimikhulu kunangaphambili yasilingonyamaonyama kayikhuba inzipho nalomangqinaayo
lipepe iselo lizilahlele phantsi ilovanekelona lezanecebo elihle nokinesela siyasithande izinambuzane zinengcasa
dizaqabamisake sibesinye ukuze ndithemise iselengaso lya kuthiqali vulamlomu lixhume lisisinambuzane
akhablezamanzii abume ngaphandle lathwayi lovani bandona bam korwe iselela lizeleka abanzi zangelibe nalune thuba lokutshoka esinabuzane eso
kwenyanzeleka ke ilovani liphine lisitye ngokwano esinabuzane eso yazeyoneengwenye yezenezebo elikezayo
koraka bantona bam abazangi babe nethamsani isela lizange liphulaphule alizange lijongenakqanye kwingwenye ngelo eshayibalisayo
niyabona ke na zakulungisa le nto watsho nomyayi nebola ke ndizakuzamukuliqhula ndihleke isengendlela elimpinelitye ngayo ngamanzajwele ngaphakatikulo
lizakuzama ke ukungiphendoli liyagodikexali qalukuvulumlo neqopi lamanzi ethu nenakulo waliqhula ke nomyayi bantwala bamkodwa isela lasuka ladekwa labiwa bubuthongo s
s kwaabakupukupunke bambi s odeteka buphukupungu wakhathazeka naye waza wathi ukuba oludaka uliyelommi ko sizakufa batshobe wonke odade buphungu phungu
iseleksina lihlela nathi abayitshibini kweye ke siyalaza sisakulungisa odade buphungu phungu kubantwana bam barhubuluzabe
nkqusela ndenyukuzela yoo ladelengathi liyanyunjazwa iselebanu mbam
tobula iintsini lihleka yoo
ngoku kebandona bam ubombaphina bnandi kwakhona zonke izilwanyana zazo noabile korakeyokusu salomini kuzakuthi kangoku
xa kushushu isele lifunuxela manzi nokuba sisipi silwayela kuzilanyana uyawusiva sisithi kwisele
se cwela sele urhabule kubekanyi awo kubekanyi owa kubekanyi nje usishiyel enati liphela apho ke ibalethu
korake ibeinalenye story power kunalibali usfundele ke amabali naninawfuna korake ukuba wafuna amabala maninzi kufundela abandola bakho okanye basifundele
ndondela unalibali dotmob kwimfanafono yakho ephathwayo uyakusumanlela ke mabala maninzi ngelwimi zahlukeneyo semahla
uyakusumanlela ke nenjibiso zokufunda wabelani abantwana bakho ngababale abakhuthaza kukwezakhono
nalibali dotmobile yidilesi yethuleyo ungamfumana ke unalibali nakufaiziboku nakumixsetsiya fumanekeka loku
zifumaneleke uxibangelwe nalibali usumanelemabali amnandi nemidlalo kula maphepha alandelayo
kwa zolunathal kusandeiwalt ngesingesi nengesulu erhauten kusandeiwalt ngesingesi ngesulu
kandike free state kusandeiwalt ngesingesi ngesotho kandike entenagamba kwisandeet ethines express ngesengesina ngesixhosa
empumakoloni kwideli dispatch ngwelezibini kuhalwa uldingwelezine ngesengesina ngesixhosa
spesiban ekwekhona ke kixesha elizayo andi unithanda naonke emakhayas s
manibulise kwakhona bomuntuzebamka lentsasaya namhlanje unalibali uphindewakho nakaloko nomathatholowenu sondelani nisiboleke indlebe
beneyazi ukuba ilizwe lizelezizinto ezintle ezimnandi kweke linizinto ezimnande zisanelayo sonke
ngodwa ke umduxa enezintezininzi makabelani nomnye ukuba ke kukho onwamona asinakho ukwanela sonke phulaphilani ke ukuba kwanzekeantoni kwelibali lithi ndiyakuqela sele khaundiselele kubeganye
ngenye imini ke kwakushushu bantonabamu kushu shukakhulu ndithi iimluvu zazishizimizimba ngamanzi zisibenswami boku yazo kwakushushu kakhulu kibandona bam ukuba ihlosilona lalifakenzwana iminyeni umnye omkhulu ozele ngamanzi lalisethi lingapha libe lingapha oh siyabulela kisiqapho siziva sipholile xaafumene kuphola ke ubomi bubamnandi kodwa lona iselebandwele bam lalingamela likwaphela nobuchushu
laselekebandwele bam iseleamanzi kwichibi ayimnandi s laa se laa laa se lasela laphela icidi
kola ke zange isela liphelele apho lazela kutribe landelayo nditsho nomlanjana umcingcuwa ulapho
lasele isela kodwa ke lalunga mphele unqaloole sale laa sela abandwana bam laa sela
ladikelafuna namanzi eklungunyomkhulu kunye nomlampu lasela emadamenditsho namachibe inamanzi amahle anombalwe isibhakabhaka aphela amanzi alo
kora ke bantwana bam lalikhusela ulwandle isel elizangeli wasela manzolwandle kubakalokwona ayinetyuaiseleke elingayithandi ncasa yawo zangizonwabeke ezinyezilwanyana bantona bam iingwenyakezona zazirhqukele

zizinto esijonganenaso ezwesiphila kuzo kodwa iingabileko uve umntu athi nandinkazibona ndiphumelele mhlandina hamba ndivule umzimveliso wezinto noko ezenza ezirhaya lambono buthe kangeqaleni ukwenzelba ndithengisifidi kubobonka bantu abanemfuya phihlaleni nabilbuyi veleyo kodwa uzawuthumkandi funufika nobhazalala wemoto ukwenzelbaniyazi bahanyandi asebenza ngokwayekekisebenzeni kwamnoko ndenzimalemini sinalo ngakike eyo sithathise ubuntu bethu namandla wokabanakukufumana izinto ezibambekayo izinto zomhlalo s iingathi zange sikhuliswe ngolohlokwa ngobakulomzeke lucafula kutthiindathethangawo kwisqebi santshuqa zenzwezekeliso ngombona uba umbona abonzokakhona xa mmtshathina senzaiso kungawo omnye umniso umgqoshwe omnye uranywe wenzibumeliimeli omnyotyiswe s iikoku

siyesifunde yokanemeko iyakwazwufundisa lukhundo andenzumzekelo uqalalindivela kuyo

xa kufike ilixelithile enyakeni ibalekile yokubanoko siyambisiyo kafulasiweza zonkezondo
xa kufike ixeshe litile nixesha lezivuno xa sesifumenezizivuno funekesenze zonkezi zidubuzibalula

yeexexes kumhlaba izilalini ingake sinayezilalini kukufumanezixhobo ezawuqinzekezi basipuhlisa lamhlaba. Klasi seto lophini sinayo ingxaki yeexesu kumhlaba. Umhlaba hayi

s zizawujonga ke ezazintwezo siphendule zizavumela kizibhalo siphenduli zibhalo s iandastende ke namaxesha kathixo ba amaxesha sixeshaphingoku kwakuqeshaphingoku akubhalwa izibalwezithili zzibhalelwa bani zibhalelwa bantu batheni bahluhlobo luni neziprofetwe zazikhutshwa ke ngelo xesha zazikhutshelwa bani bantu baqeshaphi bantu bani sosojonga kezuzintwezo kesikwazi uwuphendula and establish ubangabana ungubanolilungisa okanyeetina sibabubo kanjani na ubulungisa bukathixo
s endizameleke ukuhlambi ukunikeza impendulubangabana yintoni ubulungisa buthi ke ubulungisa
ubulungisa is the roshessness of god is the divine attribute that describes god as acting always in a way that is consistent with his own character.

na ukholo ke ngolusebenza ngolohlobo uthixo nangona isityweshi nokanyimeko imaxongo okanye kumnyama uthuthixo makubekhukhanya aqqali azamukususubumnyama a
apha ebumnyameni ubiza le nto ayifunayo itsho ibe khona athi ke mncwadi yamaromithi uthixo wethu
unguthixo othetha ngezinto ezingekhoyo ngathi zikhona zitsho zibe khona ndiqonda ke ngexamaxesha

molunonke emakhaya ngalintsasa liqeshi lokubakisi hlanga nekwakhona siphulaphule yinkqubo entra ethi nali ibali elibalikesi qalangalo namhlanje libali lomsila weharuke iharuke bantabam yayingumvundla wayihlala ekwisigqithe sithile esasengongwe ngamanzi ukuba kawuzange weva ngomvundla ungexhali
oo uyabaleka ngokakhawuleza njengemoto ibaleka idolophini okanye stela twini korok ebandona bam eyo nanto ikhwangqisayo ngalomvundla kuthwayi hee
inakuba uyazibuza ukuba kwenze kanjani kaloku kuba bemfutshane umsila walomvundla
masambini nikesi okuva ukuba kwathini ukuze ubemfutshane umsila walomvundla masambini nikesi okuva ukuba kwathini okuzebemfutshane umsila weharuki
kuthi wakhe kudangala kwakukho mvundla wayibiza ukubangu haruki ngaloo maxesha ke yonke imivundla emihle inemisila emhlophe imide kwaye ke ifukufuku ngenyekeyimini bantona bam uharuki wayunwabile esivakamnandi evuya
ebhekisa umsila wakhe ngasemva nangaphambili yonkeke imivundla ihlalesiqithini phakathina phakathikomlambomkhoo
kokurhoke ingwenya ezimnints ezilambilezi luhlaza zonkeke zazithanda ukutyamivundla emnandi kwisidlosasu saxasa kwisasemini nakwisidlo sasebusoku
yonkeke imihla phamukwesidlisakusasaroqo nesepisi kuphamukuba kwikulalwe bonke oomama bayimivundla
bagasolokekebi yala bechazila bantwana babokuba balumke umama kaharoki ke soloke esithi kuya hamdela kude kunasisantini
ndithetha ngezangwenyazinkul eziluhlaza ezilambileyo kuba kebantwana bamoharoki kunye neminyemivundle mingcinane bephulaphule abazalibabo bhabonwabile dehleka kumnandi
babedlala kebezimela ngaphantsi kwemithi bahlukumise imisilayabo bebekisa ngapha nangapha
iti isemva ibe ingaphambili babirwapiliza iingcakunyenentyatyambe zikhulayo aphisqethini ngethuba kaloku bedlala bebonke
korwa yena uharokiwakhu la whamkhulu wanomdla ukwizibona esenzezinyazinti zinikisa umdla
khumla izinto oomabethwa basichazela zona roqo lalakude kunas esantini ungayi kumlambo unamanza ngamileyo
hambelakude kwisixhagamfulesi namazinyo abukhali iingwenye eziluhlaza ezinkule zilambileyo
bonkika bahlobo bakhe bakhwaza ngaxeshanye bethetanaye babezama kumngqandakuba angaqobi kumlambo unamanzangwamileyo
kodwa uharoke kazanga akhathale uyayazukuba asinali ilungelo qobakumlambo unamanzangwamileyo abalekayo kukho iingwenye ezinkule ziluhlaza ezilambileyo
andizo kuba uzokianjani ke apho kubuqe besqithi didyongene watsho kuboke wandula wangenangaphantsi apho kwisantiya lomlambo
wathi xa eweva amanzi wakhwaza kakhulu einkosi yenkwenye uyandeva phuma emantsini inkosi emivundla ifuna ukuthetha now
watsho uharoki etingakuba inkosengwenya izakumkholwa ukuba uyinkosi mivundla na zazingaso yiki izihlobo zikaharoki zazingancazela kukoyika
emanzini apho kaloku kwaphuma ingwenya eyakhe yankhulu yavuthulula umzimba wayomkhulu yemaisantini yaavulomlomo wayomkhulu
bewabonamazinyo ayamhlop emakhulu enjalo yabedulula amehlo ayo yajonga kuharuki ijamile ewe yatshungelizwe likhulu lirabhaqa ngakwenzela ntoni wakugqiba ukuba indalo yincinane koluhlobo ndiyacinga kenkosi ukuba lithuba lokuba stelekise ubukumkani bethu nyani yadumzela iingwe ewe ndiyacinga ukuba obambukumkani bukhulu kumnobakho
s yabuza iingwebandwana bam kuqela kodwa ke ndizakubala zonke ingwenye emvakoko wena ubali imivundla yonke siya kubona kuba kubani unokumkani obukhulu kunobunye watsho ke uharoki esitshokungwenye
inkosengwenya ke zangeikholelento yivayo yazithethe langaphakathiunke lwemivudla igezayo licebo elihleka khulu elo yatho iqokelela lomazinyo ayo atsolo abukhali ngwenye
yaguquka yanyatsula ibuyele emanzini kolomlambo inkusengwenyakayathu ngelizolikhulelerhabaxa ikhwaza ibiza ezinye iingwenye
nankomca omdekewe nwenya zisenza umngelele ziphumanganyeganye emanzanzini zipendulango kuvungama zisabela ubizwe oluvela kwinkosiyazo ngokawulezakhe umlamba wazala zingwenya lithuba lam ngoku nanko esiya eshukumisa umsila wakhe omde onwabile ndiyokubakexumaquma emvakongwenya yuqala waqalisa ke ukubala nye mini ntathu
yindlela wayikhwaza ixumaquma esukakungwenyayiqala esiya kwilandelayo ne ndandathu sixenxi
wabala ke bantwana bam watsibatsiba wabala watsibatsiba wasondela ngokusondela kubuqebesiqiti waruki amashumi asithoba anesipozo amashumi asithoba anesithoba liikhulu uharuki wafikelelake kwingwenye ugqabela isanti yobuqe besiqithi yayiphabi kwakhe waxumaquma ebhekaphezulu emoyeni wakhwaza kakhulu ha haa diniqathile nonk enidenzele iblokho yokubandisuka kweslamisqethi
dizokufika kumphambi nobuqebesiqethi yathi ingwenyakeyo gqibela yakuevalomazwi yaguquka
fikelela kwisandi obuqebesqeti ephilile wagquka ejongo msila wakhe omde omhlophe ofukufukuba ndwana bam wabe ungekho endaliniyalowo ke kwasala omfutshane nawokekodwa ufukufuku akazange akhathale uharoke kubakalokelahlekelongumsilawakhe kuba ebele ingozi
wabangumfundla ke oonwabileyo eqibilekewa yekhulekile kukusisa lomini ke bantonabam yonke imivundla elapho yaba yekhulekileyo kwayeke uksisalo mini yonke imivundla yabanemisela emifutshane njengoharugilo yiloo nto ke ngokimivundla xaibona inemisila emifutshane
ngokiesfikelele sphelwentsibalethu lanamhlanje akunyanzilekanga ukuba usolokowulinda unalibali kumathotholo wakzi ukuzofundela bantwalabakho okanye bazifundele ndondela ke unalibali dotmobile kwimfonifono yakho ephathwayo
nantsi ke idilesi naliibali dotmobile ungalifumanakene uxabangelwa amabala mnandi nemidlalwe nalibali kwezindawo zilandelayo
ngolesibini kweepdispatch empomagoloni kantiike ngolwezine ebayi kwiphabali heraldi siphinesibone kwa khona kwixesha elizayo

wanomdla ukwizibona esenzezinyazinti zinikisa umdla inakuba kumnandi kwekonomdla kwenzikakananyi kubuqebesqithi watho uharuki inakuba kukweyisinti ezimnandi zokudlala kwenyezenye izilwanyana ezimiiiintsi ezinikisa umdla endinokudlala nazo ngelinye kibandana bambilanga uharuki waza necebiso linomdla oyonwabile kakhulu umsulawakhe omde walshukuma oko ubeka ngapha nangapha nangapha qashisela inakuba into s wabuza kibandana bambi slobozakhe ekelelelelelelelelelelelelelelelelelelelelelelelelehlanjenye imini eyiphi imeni haruki namhlanjenye imini ndizakwele umlambu ndekubuqe besqithi awukwazi hayi suku yenza loo nto abahlobo bakhe bomjenga

qobakumlambo unamanzangwamileyo abalekayo kukho iingwenye ezinkule ziluhlaza ezilambileyo andizo kuba uzokianjani ke apho kubuqe besqithi
didyongene watsho kuboke wandula wangenangaphantsi apho kwisantiya lomlambo

yavvulamlomo wayomkhulu yagxakamfula uharuki loo

ngolesibini kweepdispatch empomagoloni kantiike ngolwezine ebayi kwiphabali heraldi siphinesibone kwa khona kwixesha elizayo
molweni emakhaya namkelekile kwiinkqibethu ethi nali ibali sondlanike kunomathotholubeni niphulaphule ibali ikayanti elimnandi bomotu zabam
maslananenike aloku emagumbini ethu siphulaphule nali ibali ningashukume kuzondawo niphulapheleneni kuzo ibalethula namhlanje lingomthungi wayelilolo
udel bantu ngabamwa yintwimthungwayihlala kudolopheni eceleni kolwandle udelo wayithandakuthunga impahla ezintle enzele abantu bawonkebedelo phiyakhe wayiselokixakekile ethunga esikarhoqo ngosuku wayixakekile kubwangenalo nethubalukwenza izihlobo
ngenyintsasa kibantona bambi akhala intsembi yawolwido lophu wavuka udel wasolulaa
namhlanje ngelusuku lwabathengisi alikwe exeshele sika nokthunga alikwe exeshelekwenza empahla ezintsha
akwixeshe lakuthacha empahla indala ndienze entsha namhlanje losuku labathengisi
kwe namhlanje ndizakuthenga isongasibhakiweyo ijememnandi imifuno neziqhamo kudelkelo ubantonabam ezithethela ekhathazekile yeedwa
anqinisekanga kubawonke umntuza ngcokula namnamblanje wazamla ke kwakhona s ehehlebedini yokhlamba amazinyo nesiqusakhe
nenjombake wayisoloko esenza njalo rhoqokusasa wazenzila ke isidlo sasasakunye komityi yikufu wangqaba iivesti kunye neblukwe yakhe ndengqiloke udel korwa ke akazanga iinqebe ishetoanyesilamba njengokwa banyabantu besenza
yakhula ke iminyaka ingamashumi amane yayindeka kuulo kuba ke wayisicayuphomaphandhandle idl upakuyo emzibiniwakhe kanye kateni kathathu
ilentukaloke benkla bayivesi kwenibhokweyake kuphela kuba iindevuzakhe zazimfutumeza ebusika zimkhuseleke ehlotyeni
oo begeza abantu yintoni le nto bendijongekangaka ndithentshongolu hlobo udel ke bantwana bam wayewa sshwantwatha sshwapula edibanisa amazwiphefumlagawulezisa
qhubeka ithenka izinto zakhe ngesqhe loke akunamnye umntowathe wathetanaye
waziva elilolo engenamntu endlelenkebuyela indleni yakhe udel wabona iinjaneencinane ecaleni kwendlela
inje ilambileyo ke yathatha isonke eso isibhuqaphantsi kore shukuma kwakhona igodola
ngokhawuleza kebantwana bambu udel wanecebo lilungleli mangalsayo ukuba ndithenda sika esinye ison ukubandithi ndakusongela ngaso
awu awuutel bantonabam wakhangrepo kutheni yakhe isikersakacinankoo s sika ngokhaleza engunga isongasake phambukubake athintle ngondo
kwabalula kubophelela iinjange sonkaiso ngobsela iqonda awu awu nezatla zikadelke kuthe kusenjalo kebandona bam udelo weva umntwekwaza
phepha phepha upe la baleka kebandokabamininekazi sisakunjakunye nodel oh upepha ulapha kanti nendikhathe zekile nguwedelo umthungi wena udel bantonabam washukumise intloko wazishwabulela
ow nkosiya inokubo uzakuthininkethezi yentrayakhe entra upholeni ooo pepa uzakwazwigcinalento intlekangakuyuthingelo ngudel wajokwinjaye akhe uphepha ubonaka loonwabiye kwayek ufudumele uyeyazi into wajokudel upholeni dikli nseki lokuba kukweizinja ezininzi kobusike zifunayile tjazi intlekangaka
unakho ukusenzela ijizi nazo wenzekanyeloo nto udel wasikakewa nguwa sika sikabantona bam
wasikakena kwiindevuzaka ezinde ukwenza ijizi zezinja wazenzelaki nabahlobo abatsha kulapuk nayiwathi wazenzela impahla zokunqiba
kubakaloko engesinazo indevezinde zokufudumeza ebusika nokuba kezimkhusele ehlotyeni calishushu ilanga
uksisialomini kebantonabam umthungi olulolo wayeka kuba umthungi olilolo waqalisakwe kwaziwa njengomthungi oonobuhlobo
ngeentonje eningqa ubuntu nobubele umthungi wambanezihlobo wayekakuhamba yedwaxaisevwe nkleni yokuthenga
naathi ke bantona bam sinakho kufunda kweentshukubozo mthungi owayelolo kubangenye imini singenzayizihlobo ezinenzi njengalomthungi ngento nje eningi
awubantona bam ibalilethula namhlanje lifikele isiphelweningento nje ennginginizokufundila bantona bakho okanye bazifundele ndondila unalibali dotmobile kwimfanufono yakho
ezubanelaki amabali ngokolwimilwakho simahla ongasifumanakeni shunkathelo zinale ibali kunye nenkqubo ke ezinomdla roqo kwezindawo zilandayo
ngolesibini ke kuphephalethu lasempumagoloni indispech kankengolis ithatu kuphepha timezakwazulna thal erhauteng nasentshona kapa
kanti ke ngoneziyine yakulfumanake kwiiphephalethu elapha empumagoloni eli herald maspela ke ampho namhlanje bandona bam s fiesibone kakhona kwixesha elizayo
benisazi ukuba anezihlobezilungleyo sisonasipho eso kubakaloku ziyangqethe kawuningnaki ingaba wena uyazinceda ke ishlobo zakho sizakuvaka ngibalilika mulalo wancedwa zihlobo zakhe ibali elithi umulalo kunye nesikebenga elibalana mhlanje bondeemamliphalo ngokayidu umi sibulekenke eo ndiabuqala umokwezu kupekelo
sasoyikeka nokuykeka ke isikebenga saze sathe liyaxinga mhlaume ngazama kundeza heki
waza makeemulalo kwenza elubalihekisayo yelimali lenkawu kunyinindulamthi korwa ke ibali eli elizange elisonwabise isikebenga
wangwala umulalo intlokho bandona bam hamba zehweye kuwa undiphadeleka lawa satshwe isikabenga bandona bam mna zabentkenga ngokukulawona ukuba usenawo wazamake umulalo ukwela kuloo mthi kore isikhondisawo sasetyibilika kwanzimampela ukubekaphizulu ngephanya zoke kwehla into anapho kuloo mthi ketha kuyentloko inokuba intoni papazelisa amaphiko kwadikandi intaka yemilingo yazi yathi ndingasama kukunceda iintaka lokubandana bzi nobucule kwayizekwazi kwenza izinto ezihle yezekilentaka equkela iintsha kuninezi nt nentambo ende yabophelela ke intambuleyo ende phezulu emthini oh enkosi ndibulele kakhulu watsho umlalo nankokemulalo bantonabamwu kwencelakuloo ntambo wayufika phezu lemthini wakkayiqabi lo mthi elaliphezu lo apho wabuyela emva ke mulalo wathi xa ifika sati iske benga hayi awuyanga phezu wena sajoke esithatha igqabe elo uyebona wina wayinziya maqhinga andenza namaamaqinga ndifumene uncedo kuzihlobo zam
wangwala ke umulalo isikebenga sakhupha ibhekayaso nembutyisazikhuphela apho phantsi kulongca imbotyi ezo
wamba umulalo wayekulondlela yengca waqalisa uxholaxhola imbotyi zesikebenga neyazukuba wadi banantoni wadi bananembovane ezininzi zazizathi kuye sisamncati isathina
zatshu zooke imbovane ngelizwelinye wajongaphantsi umulalo bandonabam wabwana imbovane neenzi ezirhubulzayo
oo enkosini ndiyabulela kakhulu watsho kebandona bam enkumile umulalo ngoncedule mbovane ke waziqokela zonke imbzibini iskebenga zabeimbotye ziswa kuso
sabuzaka loko sididekile ngokiskebenga wapendula umulalo wathi kubakaloko zihlobozam kwaye zinjalo ihlobo ziyangadana kaomnye esengakini watsho umulalo bantolobam
wajongaphantsi umulalo apho emlanjeni kwakukhoke intlanzi aphoustileva ngumbala yasuka ke intlanze yavvezentlokuyayo aphoemanzini emlonyeniwayi bantu kabam kwakukho elityeli bomvu yoo lilitye lifunwa sisigebenga eli wadi umulalo enkosi kakhulu ndiyabulela s ngokazenze siyo watsho umulano wabuyiselake ilitye elo kusikhebenga zaqalisa ukulila izikebenka bantwena bam yoooooo akwaba iziwanyela bezindawe kundinceda namgalelela zucetanywe s akunamnyawo zeyntendifunayo shableta zam kufana nawe wasu ekibandana bam ulalo wasanga isikebenga
isikebenga sayeka ukuhlupha nangonakesisasingenakho
ukuthetane zinyezilwanyana njengoko umulalo wayisenza sesuka ekibandana bam isikebenga sabazihlobo kwezinye izilwanyana xasifuna uncedo sasincedwa naso zizinye izilwanyana
liphelakanjalo kibandala bam ibalethu lala mhla nje elithi
umulalo kunye nesikebenga ibali eli libalwe kukhayidu womi
benisazi ke bazalwa ukuba ufundelamntona wakho amabalikhayeni kubancede kubeni babengabafundaba ngcomo izikolweni

inkomu akumelendisi semlanjeni phakokubakazigodukezibuyelekhaya wayendumthemsile utata akuba ndakuzijonga inkomo zakhe
uyazi xa wophule isithembiso iingce bazaku buya ngawa kwangcumakyebandonabam usipho naye akuvakaloko utshambu esitsho
watsho ibaleka bandonabamu siphwe buyela ilalini waqokelela keinkomo zikathetawakhe utshabu ukuzeziye emlanjeni

ngethuba zona inkomo zisela amanzi
yazitsungele ngaphakathi isithi mmh ebhon elishophosa inyama imnandi kangaka isitsho kebandana bam ijonge utshabo
yathi xa ipakamisa intlokoyayo apho imlanjeni ngonyama omabini ngokamehlo ayo ayajonge ikwekwana le le inkujabo wabekila kukude ujabo kwingonyama isoyika
wathi ke ujabo undithembisile kodwa ndikusindisile kubazingeli nabo undithemsile ukubawusoze unditye
nyanisile kunjalo yatsho ingonyama bantelabam isondeleka nxinci apho kujabo
kodwa njengobaseni khulekile nje andiqondo kubandengasicena sesthempiso sam yatsho ingonyam wathi kebandana bam utshabo

kaloku tshabo ingonyama iboniwe aphakledo lophiyethu kubsokuba izolo

enlowo ke wayisolatha abanye bethatha ifotosikazimkitha ebhaphezulu bantwena bam

nye mini ntathu sonke ngoku ma sitho layali lakhe inenekazi kanye ngelothuba iquba elolabantu lolatha isibakabakene saa gquma isibakabaka hee izimkhetha zeyibone lokuyakho aphuphezulu batshu abantu bazi abavela kute uzimkitha wajokaphantsi wabonamakhulu amahlani wabantu kulatha ilokhe yakhewaqalisa ke ukuyeka uhleka

ndifuna inyama ndinike niyama anindive siza uthini ngoku ndineegusha ezimbini khawulezisa iza nazo
ndifuna inyama ndi nikeni inyama ndilambili
sisakuthi ni ngoku babuza bahlali wathi ke bantana bamunyumhlali ndineya akwe zintathu hamboku zilandayizana zoo dilambili latsho igongonga
ndifuna inyama ndinikeni kwakhona inyama sisakwenza ntoni ngoku babuza bantona bambabahlali ndina bokho ezinu
s ndifuna inyama ndinikeni inyama ndilambili sisakuthini ngoku bathi abanye ndine kukwezitlani bhale kake zanazo na s s somandona ma s sithathanazo s zihonte zonkuku zonkxalinye ulomqala umkhulu
mmh zemnandi niyabonakke ezonkuku zizakumgcina unwabile ugongonga watshouta domkhulu andicini njalo yatsho into macinani yanyanisilelo ntombi ncingi ngosuko ilandelayo bantonabamlabuya iikongqongqo lukhohlakeleyo lalilikhulu ngongathi limpina phindwe kabini lalilikhulu ngokweneni liyidingathi ngomthi iindle lalikwaza ngayo yenisane sikhulukhulu kuneciqelekileyo ooooh
ndifuna enye enyama inenzi sisekuthini ngoko kuyaphela ukutyakwethu
ndide ndifuna enyam bilambili ndifuna enyama inenzi ndide ngomezimbini
hahaha ndifuna enye nyam ndinikeni inyama nditye ndilambele
ayini sisakwantsantoni ngoku ukutya kwentukiyaphele nditha ndifuna enyam ndilambele ndifuna enyama ngoku
abahlali kebandana bambathi zizakumgcinake unwabile ezinkoku yathi ntomasa nencina
hayi na anditsingenjala kwakhonake yenyanisilelo ntwazana ngosuko landelayo lapheendelabuyelo ngongongongo
ilizulwano lalikhulukaloku kuba abahlali balapho babevala indlebe xalikhwaza lithetha mmh
yaha sisabthini ngoku liza kutyayomke into esinayo
ndinentendina yoko yokuba atye ubusislarha sidle isikhulu kunento zonke apha elizwini
yajinto mazana incinane ntoni leyo labuze igongqongqo bandona bam yathi intwazana incinani
kumelendik usi apho ndilandeleke loo ntwazana ngelithathelo ngongqongqo lini nkqohlakali alikhupha apho ibaleni nabahlali balodolophu ke balandela
babuza nakabahlali yenza ntoni leentwazani kwaye iyaphi emlanjeni loo ntombincinaneke yema inyelelwilelangwa yolata emanzini ukutya kwakhoke kulapha ngonqo kumele uzibambisele ngokwakho ubusisilaka bantorabam wajonga abhemanzini wabona yena apho emanziniwohohoh
khawujonga ukuba hlethe nokuba unkulu kwalendalo bona kalayine ngcasa ndilambile kakhulu latsho igongongo
lasondela ke ngaphambili igongongo bantwana bam liyindele ukutsibele mfanekizawalo
yesondela ke kancinto mazaniani abokulonga semvayi ngongomi hamba ngongongo hamba ngongondini lambeleyel khohlakelele ngahluthiyo umlambo kebandana bam wali lahla kugrubongqondo abazangi baklwini balbona abantu kebalodolobu bakunwabile kakhulu badethe abanisizo ngaloo nini atya ukutya kumnandi badanisa bayibulela intobazana iingcinci eyathi yasendisa abantu balondawo kwigongqongqo elkhotla keleyo
s liphela apho ke ibalethu bantwana bam khumbula nike akunyanzilekanga ukubawulindele kumamelake amabali ethukwenali ibali kunomathotho lokuphela unakukalo kukufunda amabali natshela liphina ufuna
ukuba ke ufuna amabali amaninzi okufundila umntona wakho okanye bazifundele ntwendela kunali iibali.mobi kwimfonifono yakho ephathwayo
uyakusumanelaki amabala maninzi ngokolwimilwakho simahla ungwesumanela ke nesishonkathelo senali iibali namabali kwenengqobezinomdla
roqo kwezindawo zilandelayo ngolesbini ke kwiiphepalethu idispatch empomakoloni kanti kole zithantu kwiiphepa the times kwazulnatal erhawutengu nasentshona kapa
sondelani kaloku unomathatheleni unipulaphule nali ibali lixesha kaloku filmane ibali sifikelelaki kwindow sizininzi zihlanga nebantwana bam nembuso zahlukeneyo
ibalana mhlaanje kaloku limovus lahha isigebenga okanyebandona bam singati ligonqonqo elikulu
hlala ngeekilondama ootata ommakhul notata omkhulu kwakunyakena bantwana
zimela nonti naso isigebenka nalo iikonkqonkqo ndifuna inyama ndondleni nonke ndifuna inyama ndilambila ndifuna inyama ngoo
ndifuna inyama ndiphene inyama ngoku sisakwenza njali ndinayo iinkomo nboku ilanda iza nayo naboba ndolabambesisa nayi inkomo
besosikhohlakalise ngongongo sayixhaka mfula sayityhenge
lomazinyaya makhulu apkhali ndifuna inyama ndinike niyama anindipha siza ukeni ngoku ndine kusha izimbini
hayi bantona mbam asiruthi esisilwanyana ndifuna inyama ndinikeni inyama ndilambili
sisakuthini ngoku babuza bahlali wathi kebandana bamunyumhlali ndineya akwe zintathu
ndifuna inyama ndinikeni kwakhona inyama siza kwenzantoni ngoku babuza bantona bambahlanu ndina bokho s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s na sruba nto namam sithatha nazo srongezomkuku zonxalinye kulumqala umkhulu
s zamnandi niyabonak ezonkuku zizakumgcina unwabile ugongongi watshota tomkhulu andicinialo mna yatsho into mazani ncinani
yenyanisilelo ntombi ncingi ngosuko ilandelayo bantona lambuya ikonqonqonqo lukhohlakeleyo
lalilikhulu ngongathi limpina phindokabini lalilikhulu ngokwenene liyidingathi ngomthi
indlela likhwaza ngayo yeinisane sikhulu kakhulu kuneciqalekileyo
ooooh ndifuna enye enyama inenzi sise kuthini ngoku kuyaphela ukutya kwethu ndide ndifuna enyam ndilambili ndifuna enyama inenzi ndide ngome zimbini bale kakhe iza nazo
ndifuna enye nyama ndikeni inyama siza uuthini ngoko elikonkqonkoli fune enyama oko alihluthi ndineegusha ezini khawulezake yizanezo kutsha ile kandugqinikusa ndilambile nje ubusislahakeywe wazitsibela wazityanga xa lmelo lommiqhulu zonke ezokusha
bakhala abantona bama bahlali kuyaphela kalokukutya nenyamazabo ha ha ha ndifuna enye nyam ndinikeeni nyama ndiyitye ndilambele
ayini sisakwenza ntoni ngoku ukutya kwethuku yaphele ndithe ndifuna enyamu ndilambele ndifuna enyama ngoku mnandi neyakwe intandato
bakhala kaluka bantu ekhlaleni ndifuna inyama ndilambile ndifuna enyama nandina boko ziipozo mmh
ngamnandi ukuva oko s kawulezisa izanazo nditye dilambili
ndininu kokezil ishumi mna khaulezaki amboku zilanda obantwana bam ubusilakha wazichatakalo kukonkqonkwa wazilhafuna zonkezonkuku zolishomi kukhaulezaki waziginyexlomlilomo wakhe omkhulu

yatshe into mazana incinane ntoni leyo labuze igongqongqo bandona bam
yathi intwazana incinani kumelandikuse apho ndilandeleke loentwazana ngelithathelo ngongongongo ninkqohlakali ali kuhupha apho ibaleni
nabahlali balodolophu ke balandela babuza nakabahlali yenza ntoni leentwazani kwaye iya phi emlanjeni loo ntombincinaneke yema inyele nilango
yollata emanzini ukutya kwakhoke kulapha ngongongo kumele uzibambisele ngokwakho ubusisulakaba nabam wajonga apho emanzini wabona yena apho emanzini
wohohoh khawujonga ukuba hentle nokuba unkulu kwalendalo
bona kalayini ngqasa ndilambile kakhulu latsho igongongo lasondela ke ngaphandleli ngongongo bantwana bam lindele ukutsibela umfana kizowalo
yesondela ke kaninitomazani aokulonga semvayi ngongongo hamba ngongongo hamba ngongongondini lambeleyel

ntwendela kunali ibali.mobi kwimfonafono yakho ephathwayo uyakusumanelaki amabala maninzi ngokulwimilwako simahla

subalekela kutya tathwethu uyesu uyakunike zamanzi ey uooquenza ungasabi ngumxatshazwa s lihlabathi ungaxatshazwa zizinto zehlabathi kodwa s impilo yobumnandu s apho impilo yokungazisolwi umtono yesu akazisolutixo hlalakuye uyesu ahlale kuloo mntu ibe ngulumntu mzalwane ayivapha kuye xa zeyigwe lapha kuye le ntwaphezulu ahra lele sengase naloo naloo ayifumane ngoba leentoxasifumene bazalwane ayibenzi abantuba benomono

uyithengikani libelikhulu ufiflitya s s wamanzi uzamintoobana uzawizirhuthisa kothwa ngaphaya kwaloo s 25 litra yamanzi unganwe ngoba umphefumlona awaselamanza semthombeni namanzasetepeni kodwa usel amazwi amanzi alilizwi ligathixouyahlala kamnandi phezikomhlaba uhlalimpilo iomntongazisoliyo ngoba uhlelkuyuyesuyesu hleliklomntu alibonkabanikosi s

yenaka ukeketo bandokabam wanceda omakulwaka uxoma ezozinto zinobunzima kwadike ngeentlasa yangomvulo kubandaka kulu ukeketo yena ekhangaleinto azakwimnweba waci nyakimante kabam kubandaka ngakanamhlanje ndisakumabantoni ikawusizam esimhlophe sicocekile koreyisihlanguzam ezinompala besibakabaka zimdaka ilokwe yam ebintiyone icocekile korehisi yam igqamileyo enemica i iintaka iincutsu ssizlu samsa kusasebeni sigye kodwa ke baka ndokujonga

yee wahlika wada omakhulu ayi kaloku mzi kulwana wamu ayifuni manzi ashushu

ooo latsho ixekwazana ndiva kamnandi
laghula kayiqhinaelo ukuzeengobo izihlalinje kakuhle ingaqiniswanga laqalisa ke ukuzivalifudumele kamnandi la ngumayixekwazana lunwabile

eeey wena neekamakhuli bekeke yokutya latsho ipolisa
eeewe ndinike ibheke amyokutya ndiyakuceli watsho umakhulu enokufudumala bantonabam
koromnumzana unkosa kazangamkhatele omakhulu kunyelepolisa wakhwela kiteshbe kusango ilikhulo
wayakutsho ngapha komzogcino zilwanyana kawutshonke watsho umakhulu
isela libalikela kumzogcina izilwanyana sisidinge esi iza makhulu masilibambe lafudumalabantoka bam latsho ipolisa
umnumzana onkosi wayengajonganga akwayakhona wantsiba bantona bam
wawela kanye kwisitya s kamexikunyinofusi indod leyo watsho umnumzana onkosi
wayigorle ilungileyo enembeko wathi akubonamnomzana ukosephetheypeki okutya waphakama wema ngenyawo
koromnumzala onkosi wayisile esembindini wodonga waza umexibondona bam womtsala ngomlenze emdetha
emtsalila esantsi umnumzana onkosi nako ke umnumza nonkosi ewele ngabhakathi kwakhona kwesostiya ow ow wali la umnumza nonkosi umexwatsho labantolabam ibegileyo izele  ofu otesi wazithathanezo swekile wazilahlela kude
zaga ayityene loofyesonga bandona bamnayo wayilahlela kude kwathi xa yijonga eqibeleni zantsi kuloo beka wabonakukho amabananamahle amthobe
wabeta umnumzana unkosi enklooko wathi suka kule ndawo kodwa nkosi watsho umex epholile bandabam ebulela
babona umnomzana onkosi ehleli apho nalia elasela walila umakhulu dinike ibheki yamsteke ndiniseni dota
ewe nika omakhuli ibheki akhe ibuyise kuye lakhwaza kebandona bamlatsho iipolisa oh kulungil nantsi ibeke yakho makhulu watsho mnomzana unkosi waphuma ke omgcindweendawo yezilwanyana ezungcedisa uxolaxhola izinto sikamakhulu ezibuyisele kulobhekyo kuyo emarkeni wasondle apho ke edongeni wayinika umakhulu ibegleyo wafaka ke isandla ebhokuthweni yakhe
wanika umakhulu imalukuthenga amanyi amabanana oh uxolo ndiksela uxolo makhulu watsho mnomzana onkosi
s wamba kinalo bekiyakhe yukuthenga amanyamabanana eleqanitekise ngodukayo ngokumakhulu
umnumzele onkosi ke wayisaphulula indawuzakhe zibuhlungu ejonkephezulu apho kwipolisa
ndiyathembisa answaza ndiphina ndibayibhek zokutye zabantu kwakhona kodwa ndiyacela kumela ndiphumi aphakile ndawo undithathe undise kwisikhulu samapolisa ndiyacela waceka ke umnomzana umkosi umphathi wendawo yezilwanyana
wanikezela umnomzana umkosi kwipolisa uya bona ngoku max? latshayi polisa ubambe elonasela likhulule begzabantu
ndiamthatha umnomzana ukosi ngoku ndiamsakwisikhulu samapolisa kora ke zakubuya ndizokubona wena ngomso
ngeentsasayilandelayo ke ipolisa laphatela ompathu amapolisa iikadar ikhameranondaba emzisa kwindawo yogcina izilwanyana
naa lloyihloko ndibalabantu lisimiza lulandela umgcinwendawo yezilwanyana wabavulela ebathomla kulondawo yayihleli umex kunyinofusi
umphathi wamapolisa bantabam wakhuba iimbasa wayithatha wayijingisa entanye nikamex abadlali bamaxilongo bedlala ingoma imnandli
umfotiyana wayithatha imifanekiso kamex enalombasa entanye niyakhe yelampapashiweendaba wayibhala ibanu ngumex inyakenisela lebeke elidonileyo
kunyeandivane ke yabantu iyilapho yayicula kumnandu wamkelekile kumkhoswa amapolisa max ngoku uli polisa wezeke umphathu amapolisa wadlulise kumex amabananzi amthobi enkosi watcha umex
