hlala apho keklondawo usiboleke ezondlityenazakho uphulaphule nalibali
kudala kebandwada bam kokhweentombazanana kwakuthwangulala ulala wayithanda ukudlala iphanzi yesarha
wayithanda ke yonke iindongayo ukusuka kumifanekiso esepuxini ukuya kwiixesha apho athi afakhe isiquentshana soqibela sephanzi endawiniyaso
wayithanda ke isandi kwanemvakalelo athi abenazo xa esasaza izoziqwentshana phezi kwetafile roqo kengintsase ngomqibelo xa umamakalala emsakuthala lengcwadi esiyakutshintsha encwadi zakhe
ulala abantanabam wayengayilibali phazel wayithatha nayo ngoku kibantanabam umgcinizi ncwadi wazithatha iiphaziswa sifaka ngapha kwetafile yakhe kwayekibondana bamkomqebelongamnye xaifika ulala ibuza ukuba
anganakho nokubalekwa ipazelisi azeke athiyena umcinisi ngwadi yoo lala
kuro uyagula ngokusipazos kwenze kantoni asukibandana bam angakhathali ulala kubayizazi kuba uyagulange neneziphazersigeminyike imiqibelo umhlobokalala ugama lingushila wayendwendola ulala ukuzebandlali kunye iphazers ezo
waphantsi ke wabangumhlobo wenene kalala korangaphandle nje kwento enye ushila weegqweswa kwinto yonke bantwanabam
ngenyintsasake yangomqibelo ulala waboleka ephazil yokhozilwaseafrika kwithala lingwadi
umsanekiso ke wobonisa iintaka iphezu lesibakabakene iivule kakhulu amaphiko ayo iphete intlanzi ngomlomo wayo
leyonakiphazel yayineziqwantshana ezininziqnezinye ephazel awakhe wazidlala ngaphambili konkenjalo ke kuphela lephazil bantonabam iziqoncenazayo zazincincunizinye iipazal ebeqele ukuzidlala ulala
ulala ke wengabunaka lingatho nwabile korona yeushila wengulma banga inokuba iintoni bethu intwayifuna kukuba kuqalise okudlala ipazelo ezi
wathi ke ushila lala andithandu ukudlala eipazel empimna ndifunasitlala iivenkile watsho ushila bantorabama wavumana yeulala wathi kulungile xa siqebeli siyidlala iphazil yamshila umnakelala ndizakubankumgcini venkile kwaye ndizabankumgcini venkile uqwesileyo ke wena ke uzakubankumthengi wam wakhauleza ke ulala kwisebenisa yihonke imaliya ke waziwadi ushila bantonabam lala masidlale isibhedlele ngoku
oh why watsho ulala bantonabam engayifuni le nto sidlalile ivenkile shila ngoku masidlale iphazile yam kodake ushila kwa khona wayingafuna kudlala iphazilwa waziwathi ke bantonabam ushila masidlale sidlale isibhedlele lalakuzefakwa sidlisasemini sidlale ke iipazile yakho benzanjalo kebandana bam wathi ke ushila lala ndisabangogqirha ngoku hayi kodwa shila uyantiqhatha ngoku kuqal ubomcini venkile watsho ulala bantana bam dimgoku oza kubankugqirha hayi aquazilala ukubankugqirha wene watsho ushila bantana bam kubam nandiyaqweswaakubanguqirha hayi okwazi lala ukubanguqirha wena wajoshila bandona bam kubamnandiya qwesa ukubanguqirha waza ke ushila wabanguqirha yena ulala wabasisikulana ngoku ke wathuqirha xa iqala okuxilonga isikulana wasinyombaza isikulane sahleka isikula lobandelabam asakwazi ukuzolawasimholisa isikula noogqirha wathi
hlala kakuhle uzoli okanye anaphina ndidlalinawe kwa khona kodakwathi phambokubake aphinde acaphokwe kwakhona ugqirha ushila
wasuka wakhwaza umamakalala ibabizela isilosasemini wathi kuba diyathemba zindombi nibenixesha elunathi
ehebhu mama watho kebandona bambulala elungele ukulumayisongasaki esibunandi esineminqatha iculeweyo kunyele botolo mama emfakusitlwisi semini sizakudlala ipazelzama watsho ulala bandodabama wapendula ushila wathi anifulu kudlala pazeli yakho mna ubuntembi silenje neshila watsho ulala abantwana mbam ebe kunjalo
kodwa andifunu ukudlalo ndifuna sifake imibala kumifanekiso mna wathi ushila abantwana mbam
engafuni nto ukudlala iphazel ezo korwangoku ulala wayisela ediniweyintetakashile yokuba
ndintatsheluk uintwayonke nokubakhe engakwazi ukubamba izithembiso wazake ulala emvokosidlo sesemini
wanikawushila incwadinimifanekiso neekrayon okozifakile imibala kubimifanekiso
koraba ndona bam kwokuselo mifanekiso omnyekloncwadi ofunakufa kwamibala
waza ushila wakhauleza wagqiba komsinya weza nayekulala imbonisa esithi mmh wena bia cisisa watsho ushile waphendula ulala wathi kaloku le yiphazel kwaye inzima shila nakoshila bantorababi sithi lala ma spedja mna ndigaqhawulazisa ndigqebeqala kunaweli phazelo kulungileki masiboni watsho ulala bantor bam nawe ungazama ukwezake simbona oyigqebe ngokhawuleza wavuma kibandona bam nayoshila esitikulungile kora ke yonkelondo ingenzeka ukuba ndiyafuna shila bantona bam wayezithempile wazekibandona bam wathi xaulala ezakwiqiba yiphazal suka wayinciba wabuyisele zonkeziqwentshana ebhokusini washiyanje esinyekuphela isiqwentshana esinemehlokhozi waziwa nikezela ngebhokisi kushila wadi kebandana bam ulala kushila kulungile lithuba lakho ngokushila nakwa ephendula ushila kwakhona esiti hayi andifuna anamandla ukwenzalo phazimna watsho ushila bandana bam
kodwa undithembisile njishila hayi khanga ndiqaliso ukukuthembisa mna watsho bantwana bam ekhwaza ushila ndithekuwe ukuba ndiyafuna ngoku ke andifuni lala mhlambekeshila awufuni kuba ungakwazi ukudlala ipazozo watsho ulala bandona bam wapendul ushila bandona bam wathi
ooo xa kunjalo ke shila masidlale ushila kibondona bam waxe udeyibhokisi kulilala ephazel
wada ndizawudlala ndizabubonisa eba ndizabamwebo enomsindo ushila ngokuwaphinda wathi

wayingwanela ukujika amazwiakhe ukuba kuyengali kwiphaza
ngokhawuleza ke wasasazakwaleyo iintwayinzileyo waqokelela yiquentshana wazibuyisele ebuxiniyazo
wabalekake bantonabamwo phumelaphandle wakwaza ulala owathi ke engelothubobe ekhwele phezulu
wathi ushila bantulobamke dikqibile uqibile yonke lophazil wabuza ulala

shila qashisela yintoni le ndifumene ingwenye uyezifune now ewentexela lala wajoke ushila ngelizwi elinwini waze ulala wehla emthini bandonobam esizezantsi apho ehlelikhona ushila wamnika ingwenye bazi bahlala apho ke besitya ezongwenye beedlala apho bejongokuba ngubani othixekute etaye zongwenye kwaye ke ushila yayinguye ooticila kudebandona bam ushila kuyacaca boya yintyatshela naa nkolala naye sishwesithi shila uyintyatsheli wena nawa ngumjalo lala uyintyatsheli watsho naye ushila oh lala nawo unguya umhloba woneni sakuhlala sigaba unguya umhloba wenene s sakuhlala singabahlobo

ulala ke wengabunakalingathi unwabile korona yeushila wengunwabanga iinokuba iintoni bethu
intwayifuna kukuba kuqaliso okudlala iphaselwe zizwe wathi ke ushila lala andithandu okudlala iphasel empimimna ndifuna sihlala iivenkile watsho ushila bantorabama wavumana yeulala wathi kulungile xa siqebeli siyidlala ephazil yamshila umnakelala ndizakubankumgcini venkile kwaye ndizabankumgcini venkile oqwesileyo ke wena ke uzakubankumthengi wam wakha oleza ke ulala kwisebenisa yihonke imaliya ke waze wathi ushila abantonabam lala masidlale isibhedlele ngoku
oh aye watsho ulala abantokabam engayifuni le nto sidlalile ivenkile shile ngoku masidlale iphazile yam kora ke ushila kwakhona wayingafuni ukudlala iphazelwa wazwathi ke bantonabam ushila masidlale sidlale isibhedle lala ukuzeemva kwasidlisasemini sidlale ke iipazile yakho benzanjalo kebandana bam wathi ke ushila lala ndisabangqirha ngoku hayi kodwa shila uyantiqhatha ngoku kuqal ubumgcini venkile watsho ulala bandana bam dimgoku uza kubanguqirha hayi okwazi lala ukubanguqirha wena watsho shila bandona bam kubamnandi aqwesa ukubanguqirha wazake ushila wabanguqirha yena ulala wabasisikulana ngokuke wathuqirha xaqala okuxilonga isikulana wasinyombaza isikulale sahlelelelelelelelela s asakwazi ukuzola wasimolisa isikula nobuqirha wathi hlala kakuhle uzoli okanye anaphina ndidlalinawe kwa khona kodakwathi phangokubake aphinde acaphuke kwakhona ugqirha ushila wasuka wakhwaza umamakalala ibabizela isilosasemini wathi kuba ndiyathemba zindombi nibenixesha ilumnandi ehebhu mama wathokibondona bambulala elungele ukulumayisongasaki esibunandi esineminqatha icoliweyo kunyele botolo mamaubuntembisile nje neshila watsho ulala abantwana bam ebe kunjalo

ma spetia mna ndikakhawezisa ndigqebeqala kunawele phazelo kulungileki masiboni watsho ulala bantona bam nawe ungazama ukuzeke sibone oyigqebenkukhaweli phazela kulungileki masiboni watshulala bantonabama nawe ungazama ukwezake simbone oyigqebe ngokhawuleza wavuma kibandana bam nayoshila esithi kulungile kora ke yonke londo ingenzeka ukuba ndiyafuna shila bantana bam wayezithempile wazekibandana bam wathixawulala ezakwiqiba yiphazal suka wayinciba wabuyisele zonkeziiqwentshana ebhokusini washiyanje esinyekuphela eziqwendana esinemehlokhozi waziwa nikezela ngebhokisi kushila wakibandana bam ulala kushila kolungile lithuba lakho ngokushila nakweiphendula ushila kwakhona esiti hayi andifun anamandla ukwenzalopazilmna watsho ushila bandana bam
kodwa undithembisile njeshila hayi khanga ndiqaliswa ukukuthembisa mna watsho bantwana bam ekhwaza ushila
ndithe kuwe ukuba ndiyafuna ngoku ke andifuni lala mhlambekeshila awufuni kuba ungakwazi ukudlala ipazos watsho ulala bandanaonabam wapendul ushila bantonabam wathi ooo ilala ndiya kwanzi kudlali iipazos watsho nomsindu obandona bam ndingcali ukipazil mna ooo xa kunjalo ke shila masidlale ushila kibandana bam waxe udeyibhokisi kulala iipazela wada ndizawulila ndizabubonisa s obandelabam wawinomsisinda ushila ngoku waphinda wadi zawulila ukubawe naophumile wayudlala phandle
dakumbisa xa ndiqibile waphumaphandleke ulala wazizobamifanikiso esantini ngekhuni
yena ushila wavula ibhokisi wakhupha isiquntshana wazi guqula abuphandleni ulala wathola iintanjana waziwayibophelela kumthi

wabaleka kebantonabamwo phumelaphandle wakwaza ulala owathi ke engelothobo wabe ekhwele phezulu
